description.en: Despite ever-increasing tension between Walt and Skyler, he pulls out all the stops in an effort to reconcile with the family. Elsewhere, Saul is instrumental in getting Jesse involved in a most-unusual investment opportunity.
description.es: A pesar del creciente conflicto entre Walt y Skyler, él se esfuerza en hacer todo lo que puede para reconciliarse con su familia. Saul ayuda a Jesse a triunfar en una inusual oportunidad de inversión.

description.en: Walt ignores Skyler's demands, furthering the rift between them and pushing her to break bad. Still suffering from panic and anxiety attacks, Hank crosses a line at work.
description.es: Walt ignora los deseos de Skyler, forzando aún más la situación entre ambos, lo cual lleva a Skyler a actuar. Hank, aún sufriendo el pánico y los ataques de ansiedad, exagera en su trabajo.

description.en: Walt loses control as he reacts to Skyler's news, endangering his job and relationships with Saul and Jesse. Hank throws himself into his blue meth investigation. Jesse enacts a new plan.
description.es: Walt pierde el control como consecuencia de la actitud de Skyler y acaba poniendo en peligro su trabajo y sus relaciones con Saul y Jesse. Hank profundiza en su investigación de la droga azul. Jesse tiene un nuevo plan.

description.en: Gus increases his efforts to lure Walt back into business, forcing a rift between Walt and Jesse. Skyler doubts her new relationship. Marie confides in Skyler about her concern for Hank's well-being.
description.es: Gus se sigue esforzando en intentar que Walt vuelva al negocio, lo cual provoca un conflicto entre Walt y Jesse. Skyler tiene dudas acerca de su nueva relación. Marie confiesa a Skyler sus preocupaciones por la actitud de Hank.

description.en: Walt settles into his new surroundings; Walt, Jr. wants answers about his parents' relationship; Hank's investigation causes problems for Walt and Jesse.
description.es: Walt se establece en sus nuevos alrededores. Walter Jr. busca respuestas sobre el estado de la relación entre sus padres. La investigación de Hank causa graves problemas para Walt y Jesse.

description.en: Hank's increasing volatility forces a confrontation with Jesse and trouble at work. Skyler pressures Walt to make a deal. Gus' actions have severe consequences.
description.es: La volatilidad de Hank le lleva a un enfrentamiento con Jesse, lo cual se convierte un problema en su trabajo. Skyler presiona a Walt para que haga un trato. Las acciones de Gus acarrean severas consecuencias.

description.en: The family waits for news about Hank. While Jesse covers at the lab, Walt attempts to placate Gus. After witnessing a disturbing outburst, Walt worries he and his family are in danger.
description.es: La familia espera por noticias sobre el estado de Hank. Mientras Jesse le cubre en el trabajo, Walt trata de reunirse con Gus. Tras observar una reacción inquietante, Walt piensa que él y su familia podrían estar en peligro.

description.en: As Hank's hospital bills stack up, Skyler hatches a plan. Walt and Gus come to a better understanding. Jesse, looking for more independence, pursues a new opportunity.
description.es: Skyler tiene una idea para pagar los gastos de hospital de Hank. Walt y Gus se reúnen para entenderse mejor. Jesse, en busca de más independencia, piensa en una nueva oportunidad.

description.en: Walt becomes obsessed with a contaminant in the lab and refuses to finish the cook until it is eliminated. A frustrated Jesse attempts to get Walt back on track.
description.es: Walt se obsesiona con un contaminante en el laboratorio, se niega a seguir cocinando hasta que se elimine y Jesse, frustrado, trata de hacer que Walt trabaje.

description.en: Skyler gets involved with Walt's business. Hank struggles with his recovery. Jesse makes a startling discovery after meeting a girl at group therapy.
description.es: Skyler se involucra en el negocio de Walt. Hank lucha por recuperarse. Jesse descubre algo sobrecogedor tras conocer a una chica en la terapia de grupo.

description.en: Against Walt's advice, Jesse lashes out. Fearing for Jesse's safety, Walt takes drastic action to intervene and tragic event leads to a shocking confrontation.
description.es: A pesar de los consejos de Walt, Jesse se dispone a atacar. Temiendo por la seguridad de Jesse, Walt interviene tomando decisiones drásticas. Un trágico evento lleva a una chocante confrontación.

description.en: With Jesse on the run and Mike in hot pursuit, Walt negotiates a bargain with Gus and concocts a disturbing plan to provide for his and Jesse's safety.
description.es: Con Jesse oculto y Mike buscando su paradero, Walter negocia con Gus y acaba llevando a cabo un plan para asegurar su seguridad y la de Jesse.

description.en: Walt and Jesse face the deadly consequences of their actions. Skyler deals with a puzzling disappearance, as Marie struggles to help Hank with his recovery.
description.es: Las vidas de Walt y Jesse penden de un hilo mientras Gus toma medidas para garantizar la continuidad de la producción de su producto. Skyler se preocupa por el paradero de Walter y Marie intenta tratar con un deprimido Hank.

description.en: Walt attempts to form a new alliance as he plans his next move. Skyler pushes Walt towards a business opportunity, in hopes of protecting the family.
description.es: Walt intenta conseguir un nuevo aliado. Skyler trata de aprovechar una oportunidad de hacer negocios para proteger la familia.

description.en: Events spiral out of control at Jesse's place. Skyler reluctantly asks for Saul's help. Marie returns to an old pastime and a friend asks Hank for help.
description.es: Skyler pide ayuda a Saul. Mientras tanto, Marie vuelve a un antiguo y molesto hábito y un amigo de Hank le pide ayuda respecto a un caso.

description.en: The Cartel takes steps to gain the upper hand. Walt and Skyler share an embarrassing secret with the rest of the family. Jesse's activities draw unwanted attention.
description.es: El cartel empieza a actuar contra Gus. Walt y Skyler comparten un secreto con el resto de la familia y los actos de Jesse atraen atención innecesaria.

description.en: When Jesse goes missing, Walt fears the worst. Skyler has an unlikely reunion. Hank shares some bad news with Detective Tim Roberts.
description.es: Jesse desaparece y Walt teme que haya ocurrido lo peor. Skyler tiene una reunión peculiar y Hank comparte malas noticias con el detective Tim Roberts.

description.en: Skyler makes an unsettling discovery. Walter, Jr. pushes his dad into a questionable purchase. Jesse offers Mike some unexpected help.
description.es: Skyler descubre algo muy inquietante, Walt hace una compra extravagante para su hijo y Jesse sigue ayudando a Mike.

description.en: A frustrated Walt gambles on a risky new plan. Skyler's business venture hits a snag. Hank recruits Walter, Jr. for an unusual outing.
description.es: Walter apuesta por un nuevo y arriesgado plan. Los negocios de Skyler se complican y Hank se lleva a Walter Jr. de paseo.

description.en: Skyler develops an unusual solution to her money troubles. Hank enlists Walt to investigate a theory. Walt's impatience with Jesse grows.
description.es: Skyler desarrolla una curiosa solución para sus problemas financieros. Hank recluta a Walter para que le ayude en su investigación personal y la falta de paciencia de Walt con Jesse aumenta.

description.en: Skyler's past mistakes come back to haunt her. Gus takes action to thwart his rivals. Jesse seeks Walt's help, with mixed results.
description.es: Errores previos de Skyler vuelven a aparecer en su vida. Gus trata de frustrar los planes de sus rivales. Jesse busca la ayuda de Walter pero ocurre algo inesperado.

description.en: Walt's family worries when he doesn't turn up for Walter, Jr.'s 16th birthday. Jesse is forced to put his lab skills to the test without Mr. White's help.
description.es: La familia de Walter se preocupa cuando él no aparece para el cumpleaños de su hijo. Las habilidades de Jesse en un laboratorio son puestas a prueba sin la ayuda de Walt.

description.en: Walt takes drastic action to protect his secret and Gus. Skyler's efforts to solve Ted's financial problems hit a wall.
description.es: Walt toma decisiones drásticas para poder proteger tanto a su secreto como a Gus. Los esfuerzos de Skyler por solucionar los problemas financieros de Ted son inútiles.

description.en: Hank pushes Gomez to pursue one last lead, while Walt struggles to protect the family. Jesse gets alarming news and rushes to meet with Mr. White.
description.es: Hank hace que Gomez investigue una última pista, mientras Walter se esfuerza para proteger a la familia. Al obtener noticias preocupantes, Jesse se dirige rápidamente a reunirse con Walt.

description.en: Walt and Jesse team up to take on Gus. With Saul's help, Walt finds an unexpected ally.
description.es: Walt y Jesse se unen para enfrentarse a Gus. Walt consigue un aliado inesperado gracias a la ayuda de Saul.

description.en: As Walt deals with the aftermath of the Casa Tranquila explosion, Hank works to wrap up his investigation of Gus' empire.
description.es: Mientras Walt trata con las consecuencias de la explosión en Casa Tranquila, Hank trabaja en su investigación acerca del imperio de Gus.

description.en: Walt and Jesse pursue an unlikely business partner. The DEA filters through various leads in hopes of finding something.
description.es: Walt y Jesse tratan de convencer a Mike para que se asocie con ellos. Mientras tanto, la DEA sigue nuevas pistas en su investigación del imperio de Gus.

description.en: Walt and Jesse formulate a new business plan. Walt shares a secret with Marie.
description.es: Walter y Jesse llevan a cabo un plan de negocios. Además, Walt confiesa a Marie un secreto.

description.en: Walt celebrates another birthday. Skyler contemplates her options, and an associate puts a crimp in Walt and Jesse's business strategy.
description.es: Walter celebra otro cumpleaños. Skyler contempla sus opciones. Un socio acaba influyendo en la estrategia de negocios de Walt, Jesse y Mike.

description.en: Walt's team gets creative to obtain the methylamine they need to continue their operation.
description.es: El equipo de Walter tiene que empezar utilizar el ingenio para obtener los materiales necesarios para continuar la operación.

description.en: Walt, Jesse, and Mike struggle over the future of their business, as occupational hazards weigh on Jesse.
description.es: Walt, Jesse y Mike deciden como será el futuro de su negocio, mientras los riesgos del trabajo preocupan a Jesse.

description.en: Walt takes control of business matters; Mike deals with the consequences of his actions.
description.es: Walter asume un nuevo nivel de superioridad en su proyecto de negocios. Mike tiene que tratar con las consecuencias de sus actos.

description.en: Walt takes care of loose ends; Walt makes a dangerous decision.
description.es: Walter se dispone a atar cabos sueltos y, viendo su éxito, acaba haciendo una peligrosa decisión.

description.en: As Walt and Jesse adjust to life out of the business, Hank grapples with a troubling lead.
description.es: Hank trata con una revelación imposible. Jesse se encuentra sólo y en un momento de oscuridad. Walter descubre que su secreto está en peligro.

description.en: While Skyler's past catches up with her, Walt covers his tracks. Jesse continues to struggle with his guilt.
description.es: Mientras Walter toma medidas para poner a salvo su dinero, Skyler se ve atrapada entre él y Hank. Jesse continúa sufriendo por su culpabilidad.

description.en: Jesse decides to make a change, while Walt and Skyler try to deal with an unexpected demand.
description.es: Jesse decide llevar a cabo un cambio, mientras que Walter desarrolla un plan para hacer retroceder a Hank.

description.en: An unusual strategy starts to bear fruit, while plans are set in motion that could change everything.
description.es: Se empiezan a poner en marcha ciertos planes que podrían cambiarlo todo. Walter considera medidas extremas debido a la amenaza de Jesse.

description.en: Things heat up for Walt in unexpected ways.
description.es: Todd es presionado por mejorar la calidad de su producto. Hank lleva a cabo una maniobra y las cosas se complican para Walt de manera inesperada.

description.en: Everyone copes with radically changed circumstances.
description.es: Walter sufre terribles consecuencias por todo lo que hizo y todos tienen que tratar con circunstancias radicalmente cambiadas.

description.en: Events set in motion long ago move toward a conclusion.
description.es: Eventos iniciados mucho tiempo atrás transcurren hacia una conclusión. El prófugo Walter lidia con sus demonios mientras Jesse sigue aprisionado y Skyler sufre las consecuencias de los actos de Walt.

description.en: All bad things must come to an end.
description.es: Todo lo malo llega a su final en el último episodio de Breaking Bad.

title.en: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie
title.es: El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie

description.en: Fugitive Jesse Pinkman attempts to outrun his past.
description.es: Fugitive Jesse Pinkman attempts to outrun his past.

plot.en: Stripped of everything, the survivors of a horrific plane crash  must work together to stay alive. But the island holds many secrets.
plot.es: Cuando el vuelo 815 se estrella en una remota isla tropical, los pasajeros deben enfrentarse a peligros ocultos y misteriosas fuerzas malignas para sobrevivir.

description.en: Stripped of everything, the 48 survivors scavenge what they can from the plane for their survival. Some panic. Some pin their hopes on rescue. A few find inner strength they never knew they had-like Kate who, with no medical training, suddenly finds herself suturing the doctor's wounds. The band of friends, family, enemies and strangers must work together against the cruel weather and harsh terrain. But the intense howls of  mysterious creatures stalking the jungle fill them all with fear. Fortunately, thanks to the calm leadership of quick-thinking Jack and level-headed Kate, they have hope. But even heroes have secrets, as the survivors will come to learn.
description.es: Jack logra abrir los ojos, después de muchos esfuerzos. Se levanta poco a poco y la imagen que percibe es la de la arena de una playa. Su mirada se va adaptando y percibe que está cerca de la selva.

description.en: Having escaped the "creature" and retrieved the plane transceiver, a group of the survivors travel to higher ground so they can transmit a signal. En route, they receive a mysterious transmission and encounter another of the island's inhabitants. Meanwhile, back at camp, Jack tends to a wounded man who reveals a secret about Kate.
description.es: Jack y Kate deciden buscar el receptor que puede encontrarse en la otra parte del avión siniestrado. Los supervivientes han construido un campamento en la playa. Cuando tratan de curar a los heridos y de reponerse de lo ocurrido son atacados por una extraña criatura.

description.en: Jack and Hurley discover an alarming secret about Kate, as the marshal's life hangs in the balance and he suffers a lot of pain. Meanwhile Kate, Charlie, Sawyer, Sayid, Boone and Shannon ponder the mysteries they have begun to uncover and worry that telling the other survivors will cause panic. They decide to lie for the time being. Also, Locke's befriending of Walt disturbs Michael, but Walt is more concerned in finding his dog. Lastly, Kate flashes back to when she was arrested by the marshal in Australia.
description.es: Jack descubre que Kate es la prisionera que llevaba el agente judicial gravemente herido a Los Ángeles. Mientras, el grupo expedicionario, que acuerda no decir la verdad sobre la señal que han recibido en el transceptor, regresa al campamento.

description.en: The survivors are jolted awake in the middle of the night when wild island beasts (which are wild boars) invade the beach encampment. Kate and Michael join the mysterious Locke on a hunt for food -- and a shocking secret about Locke is revealed. On the hunt for food someone is injured. Meanwhile, some survivors are horrified by Jack's plan for the dead bodies still scattered among the wreckage -- he wants to burn them. Jack sees someone that's not there, and we find out that one of the survivors was not able to walk but now he can.
description.es: Los ladridos de Vincent alertan a los supervivientes del accidente aéreo que unos enormes jabalíes están husmeando en la cabina donde se apiñan los cadáveres. Jack decide incinerar los cadáveres durante la noche junto a los restos del avión.

description.en:
Jack is nearly delirious from lack of sleep and struggles to overcome the haunting events that brought him to Australia and, subsequently, to the island. Meanwhile, Boone gets caught in a treacherous riptide trying to save a woman who went out swimming. A pregnant Claire's health takes a bad turn from lack of fluids, and a thief may have stolen the last bottles of water. Veronica Hamel guest-stars as Jack's mother, Margo.

Also, Jack flashes back at 12 years old, to find himself on the playground in an altercation with a bully, who ultimately beats him up, and later learns a life lesson from his father.
description.es: Jack lleva tiempo sin poder dormir; intenta sobreponerse a los duros recuerdos de su estancia en Australia. Esas visiones le atormentan continuamente. Por otro lado, Claire está preocupada por su estado de salud, que se está deteriorando y puede afectar a su embarazo.

description.en: Walt and the others are shocked when Michael is brutally beaten, but only the non-English-speaking Jin and Sun know the truth behind the attack. Meanwhile Kate, Jack, Sawyer and Sayid argue about where the survivors should camp -- on the beach, where they're more likely to be seen, or in a remote inland valley where fresh water abounds; and Locke discovers Charlie's secret.
description.es: Tras descubrir un manantial con agua, Jack, Kate, Charlie y Locke van a rellenar las botellas para sus compañeros. En su ausencia, Jin agrede brutalmente a Michael en la playa, ante la impotencia de Sun y Walt.

description.en: Charlie begins a painful journey of withdrawal from drugs, surprisingly aided by Locke, whose true motive for helping Charlie is a mystery. Meanwhile, survivors struggle to find and free Jack when he's buried alive in a cave collapse, and someone might be secretly thwarting Sayid, Kate, and Boone when they enact a plan to find the source of the French transmission.
description.es: Charlie sigue sufriendo el síndrome de abstinencia y pide a Locke las drogas. Éste le anima para que lo deje, asegurándole que a la tercera vez que se las pida se las dará.

description.en: Shannon's inhaler runs out and Boone believes Sawyer has the remaining three in his stash. When Sawyer refuses to give them up, Jack and Sayid resort to torturing Sawyer until he agrees to reveal the location of the inhalers. In flashback we hear Sawyer's story and find he is not who he says he is.
description.es: Shannon sufre un ataque de asma y no puede respirar sin sus inhaladores. Boone confiesa que cree que Sawyer puede tenerlos, puesto que éste también tiene un libro de ellos. Sawyer deja entrever que así es, pero no está dispuesto a dárselos a cambio de nada.

description.en: Sayid's life is placed in grave danger after he stumbles upon the source of the mysterious French transmission, the woman Danielle Rousseau (guest-star Mira Furlan). She was on the distress call and is found alive. Meanwhile, Hurley has a ridiculous plan to make life on the island a little more civilized.  The plan involves golf clubs he finds in the debris, and it looks like it just might work.  Lastly, we flash back to Sayid's childhood friend Nadia as well as his participation in hostage situations in Iraq.
description.es: Sayid decide adentrarse en la jungla para averiguar más sobre la señal de socorro y sobre todo para descubrir dónde está la fuente de energía. El peligro se cierne sobre él cuando se encuentra con la mujer francesa que había enviado la petición de auxilio.

description.en: Claire has a horribly realistic nightmare about her new baby being harmed or kidnapped. Flashbacks reveal Claire's backstory: the former boyfriend who got her pregnant, then abandoned her, and the psychic who convinced her to take the ill-fated flight that landed her on the island.  Hurley is shocked and confused when he discovers that Ethan Rom (guest-star William Mapother), another plane crash survivor, does not appear on the flight manifest.
description.es: Claire sueña que le roban a su bebé. Jack, Kate y Charlie están preocupados por las pesadillas de la joven, que recuerda como su novio la abandonó cuando supo que estaba embarazada.

title.en: All the Best Cowboys Have Daddy Issues
title.es: Incluso los mejores tienen conflictos generacionales

description.en: Survivors wonder why Charlie and Claire have been abducted - and by whom - and a search party ventures into the treacherous jungle to look for the pair. Suspicions focus on Ethan Rom (guest-star William Mapother), who, it was recently discovered, was not a passenger on the doomed flight.  Jack battles inner demons relating to his father,  while Boone and Locke discover another island mystery.
description.es: Los supervivientes del accidente aéreo no encuentran a Charlie ni a Claire. Para intentar resolver el enigma deciden ir en su búsqueda y averiguar qué es lo que les ha pasado. Temen por Claire debido al avanzado estado de su embarazo.

description.en: Jack, Kate and Sawyer fight over possession of a newly discovered locked metal briefcase which might contain insights into Kate's mysterious past. Meanwhile, Sayid asks a reluctant Shannon to translate notes he took from the French woman. A rising tide threatens to engulf the fuselage and the entire beach encampment, and Rose and a grieving Charlie tentatively bond over Claire's baffling kidnapping.
description.es: Locke y Boone descubren un falso suelo de metal en mitad de la selva. Los dos hombres deciden averiguar qué es lo que se esconde debajo. Por su parte Jack, Kate y Sawyer ven un maletín en el fondo de una laguna. Los tres se enfrentarán para intentar recuperarlo.

description.en: When Locke learns that Boone wants to share their "secret" with Shannon, Locke decides to teach him a lesson.  This leads to Shannon's life being placed in what seems like peril.  Boone and Shannon's dark past is revealed in a shocking backstory that recalls their relationship right before the plane crash and presages the return of the beast. Kate, who has become a confidante to the soft-spoken Sun, is puzzled by Sun's mysterious behavior and the revelation that she can speak English.  A hungry Hurley must convince Jin to share his fish by making up for offending Jin by rejecting his offer of raw fish early on, or he'll continue to suffer digestive problems from the limited island diet.
description.es: Boone no ve con buenos ojos que su hermana, Shannon, mantenga una buena relación con Sayid. El joven es partidario de decirle a su hermana que él y Locke han descubierto una trampilla en la selva. Pero Locke no está conforme y golpea al joven dejándole inconsciente.

description.en: Violence ensues and a mysterious island beast makes a re-appearance when Michael and Locke clash over Walt's upbringing. Meanwhile, Charlie is tempted to read the missing Claire's diary, and Sayid enlists Shannon to help decipher the French woman's map.
description.es: Locke y Michael discuten por la forma en el hombre está educando a su hijo Walt. El niño no soporta que su padre y su mejor amigo discutan y decide irse. Mientras el niño está sólo en la selva una misteriosa bestia lo acecha.

description.en: After the missing Claire returns with no recollection of what has happened since before she boarded the doomed Oceanic flight 815, Jack and Locke formulate a plan of defense against her kidnapper, the mysterious Ethan (guest-star William Mapother), who threatens to kill off the other survivors one by one unless Claire is returned to him. Meanwhile, the disappointment Charlie feels when Claire does not remember him triggers recollections of a woman he had let down in the past.
description.es: Claire consigue llegar hasta el campamento donde pasan la noche. Pero la joven no recuerda nada del secuestro, ni siquiera del accidente aéreo. Jack y Locke están preocupados por la amenaza de Ethan de matar a los supervivientes sino le devuelven a Claire.

description.en: Kate and Sawyer divulge dark secrets to each other while tracking a renegade boar that Sawyer swears is purposely harassing him.  Hurley and Sayid worry that Charlie is losing it after facing a brush with death and killing Ethan with 6 bullets to the chest.  A shocking prior connection between Sawyer and Jack is revealed in a flashback which shows Sawyer meeting Jack's father in a bar. Robert Patrick ("Terminator 2: Judgment Day," "The X-File") guest stars.
description.es: Sawyer se despierta sobresaltado por una pesadilla. Pero en realidad lo que le ha despertado es que un jabalí estaba husmeando entre sus cosas. El animal se asusta y sale corriendo, llevándose con él el toldo que cubría la cabaña que Sawyer se había construido.

description.en: When the raft the survivors have been building mysteriously burns down, Michael is convinced that Jin is responsible for the sabotage, which only serves to escalate their rivalry. Meanwhile, Sun stuns her fellow survivors with a surprising revelation, and Boone gives Sayid a warning about his step-sister Shannon. Lastly, more details of Jin and Sun's troubled marriage are revealed through flashbacks.
description.es: Michael ha conseguido construir un barco para poder intentar salir de la isla. Pero un incendio lo destruye totalmente. El hombre sospecha de Jin, con el que había iniciado una rivalidad por su amistad con su mujer, Sun.

description.en: When Hurley becomes obsessed with the French woman and heads into the jungle to find her, Jack, Sayid and Charlie have no choice but to follow. Hurley flashes back to the hugely life-altering experience he had before boarding the plane.
description.es: Mientras está en la selva, Hurley, Charlie, Jack y Sayid encuentran un puente de madera que permite al grupo indagar. De regreso al campamento Hurley descubre algo que está relacionado con la mujer francesa que vive en la selva.

description.en: Locke thinks he's being sent a sign on how to get the hatch open, and he and Boone venture inland. Jack is reluctant to offer assistance when Sawyer begins to experience excruciating headaches and needs glasses.
description.es: Locke y Boone se adentran en la selva para intentar abrir la escotilla que han encontrado. Mientras esto sucede, Locke tiene recuerdos de su infancia y de su relación con sus padres en los que recuerda cómo soñó que se estrellaba un avión.

description.en: Jack tends to a severely wounded Boone after Locke returns him to the caves.  In the confusion, Locke slips away to deal with his guilt over the crisis. Meanwhile, Claire unexpectedly goes into labor while deep in the forest.
description.es: Los supervivientes tratan de rescatar de debajo de los escombros de la avioneta a Boone pero éste está malherido. Jack intenta curarlo. Con apenas medios tratan de practicarle una transfusión de sangre.

description.en: After another funeral, tempers rise as the survivors' suspicions of each other grow, and an unlikely survivor vows revenge. The events that landed Sayid on Flight 815 play out as he engages Locke in a psychological game of cat and mouse to uncover the truth about the mishap that claimed Boone's life.
description.es: Los supervivientes se sienten afligidos por la muerte de Boone. Su hermana Shannon no puede controlar su dolor mientras lo entierran. Jack sospecha que la desaparición de Locke es debido a que esconde algo.

description.en: Jack suspects foul play when Michael becomes violently ill while building the raft. The suspects include Sawyer and Kate, who compete for the last seat on the raft and do anything possible to prevent each other from getting it.  Meanwhile, a secret from Kate's past is revealed to the other survivors on the island.
description.es: Los supervivientes siguen construyendo la balsa para intentar salir de la isla y conseguir ayuda con la que rescatar al resto. Kate hace todo lo posible para ser una de las que vayan en la balsa.

description.en: The French woman-Danielle Rousseau-shocks the survivors by showing up to the camp with a dire warning about "the Others" who are on the island, and the black smoke that precedes them. Meanwhile, Michael and Jin ready the raft for sailing.  In flashbacks, we see the survivors final moments before they boarded their fateful flight.
description.es: Danielle Rousseau, la mujer francesa, aparece por sorpresa en el campamento para avisar a los supervivientes que Los Otros les acechan. Mientras tanto, Michael y Jin ultiman la preparación de una balsa para salir de la isla.

description.en: The castaways on the raft are surprised at sea by something unexpected. Meanwhile, remaining islanders attempt to blow open the hatch, and a visitor to the encampment might be a threat to Claire's infant son.
description.es: Los supervivientes que se embarcan en la balsa viven su primer encuentro con "los otros" en el mar, con resultados desastrosos. Mientras, el resto intenta abrir la escotilla que encontraron en la selva, pero la empresa resulta más difícil de lo que esperaban.

description.en: The castaways on the raft are surprised at sea by something they didn't expect. Meanwhile, remaining islanders try to blow open the hatch, and a visitor to the encampment might be a threat to Claire's infant son,.
description.es: The castaways on the raft are surprised at sea by something they didn't expect. Meanwhile, remaining islanders try to blow open the hatch, and a visitor to the encampment might be a threat to Claire's infant son,.

description.en: Episode 0 of season 1
description.es: Episodio 0 de la temporada 1

title.en: Man of Science, Man of Faith
title.es: Hombre de ciencia, hombre de fe

description.en: Jack, Locke and Kate explore the mysterious hatch but Jack decides to wait before going down into the hatch. Kate and Locke aren't so patient. When Shannon chases after Vincent the dog, she encounters a familiar face in the jungle.
description.es: Cuando Jack, Kate y Locke investigan la escotilla abierta, encuentran un hombre que vivía dentro de ella, quien cree que ellos son alguien más. Shannon tiene un misterioso encuentro en la selva.

description.en: With the abduction of Walt fresh on their minds, their raft destroyed, and Jin missing, Michael and Sawyer fight for their lives in the middle of nowhere in the ocean and discover a new predator in the roiling sea. Meanwhile on land, Locke must descend into the hatch when Kate goes missing inside.  Also, Jack isn't too far behind Locke as he decides to go into the hatch as well later on. Lastly, flashbacks reveal more of Michael's troubled relationship with ex-lover Susan and their baby son Walt as they fight over custody for Walt and Michael must let go.
description.es: Michael y Sawyer (quien está lesionado) tratan de sobrevivir al peligro del océano, mientras no pueden encontrar a Jin y Walt en ningún lado. El misterio de la escotilla se resuelve.

description.en: Michael, Sawyer, and Jin find themselves prisoners after they encounter what they believe to be a group of Others. At the Hatch, the group learns more about their new surroundings but are confused at Desmond's reaction when the strange computer equipment is broken.
description.es: Jack y Locke descubren el propósito de la escotilla. Michael, Sawyer, y Jin son capturados por personas que creen que son "Los Otros".

description.en: Hurley struggles with an assigned task inside the hatch as he flashbacks to disturbing memories in his life before the crash. Meanwhile, Sawyer, Michael and Jin learn the identities of their captors on the island. Claire uncovers a startling piece of information about the fate of the raft.
description.es: Hurley sufre dificultades con una tarea asignada al interior de la escotilla. Michael, Sawyer y Jin descubren que sus captores son en efecto otros supervivientes del vuelo 815 de Oceanic.

description.en: The tail-section survivors trek back to the southern beaches of the Island, but encounter trouble as Michael sets off by himself to find Walt. Meanwhile, at the main camp, Sun is heartbroken as she realizes that she has lost her wedding ring.
description.es: Jin y Eko continúan la búsqueda de Michael que se ha ido en busca de Walt. Preocupada por la vida de su esposo, Sun busca su anillo de compromiso que ha perdido.

description.en: Sawyer's wound becomes life-threatening as he, Michael and Jin make their way through the interior of the island with the tail section survivors. Meanwhile, Shannon is once again haunted by visions of Walt.
description.es: Shannon ve a Walt por la isla en repetidas ocasiones y comienza a buscarlo. Con Sawyer cerca de la muerte, Ana Lucia y el grupo de la cola del avión llegan al campamento de los otros supervivientes.

description.en: The harrowing first 48 days in the lives of the tail section survivors are revealed. Flashbacks reveal the point of view of Ana-Lucia, Mr. Eko, Bernard and Libby and other survivors as they landed on the other side of the island on the beach. As the days progress danger hits their camp as well when "The Others" start taking people against their will.  As the survivors race inland, trying to stay a step ahead of The Others, they realize that someone among them wasn't on Flight 815.
description.es: Los 48 días después del accidente son renarrados desde el punto de vista de los otros supervivientes, que fueron atacados repetidamente por Los Otros.

description.en: Violence erupts when Ana Lucia and her group stumble upon Sayid and the other castaways on the island. Ana Lucia holds Sayid captive. Kate and Jack care for Sawyer when Mr. Eko brings him back to the camp himself. Flashbacks reveal Ana Lucia's troubled life as a cop.
description.es: La llegada de los otros supervivientes al campamento finalmente se produce pero por un malentendido todo acaba en una tragedia.

description.en: As Kate’s backstory continues, her original crime is revealed. She thinks something is haunting her through Sawyer.  Locke and Eko make an interesting discovery about the film, and Michael has a mysterious encounter with the computer.
description.es: Kate piensa que se está volviendo loca mientras atiende a un herido Sawyer. Locke y Eko descubren más sobre Dharma, y Michael recibe un inesperado mensaje en el ordenador.

description.en: When Eko finds Charlie's Virgin Mary statue, he demands that he take him to where he found it at once. Michael continues to communicate on the Swan computer without the other survivors knowing.
description.es: Eko le pide a Charlie que le guíe hasta el aeroplano que transportaba droga. Claire pierde la confianza en él al descubrirse que seguía ocultando droga.

description.en: Jack, Locke and Sawyer follow after a determined Michael after he heads into the jungle toward the dreaded "Others" in search of Walt. Meanwhile, Sun has a surprising reaction to Jin's desire to join the search party, and Hurley and Charlie commiserate over the age-old conundrum of "what women want."
description.es: Michael abandona a los supervivientes para ir en busca de su hijo. Jack, Locke y Sawyer lo persiguen, pero encuentran una sorpresa inesperada en la jungla.

description.en: When Charlie's vividly surreal dreams lead him to believe Claire's baby, Aaron, is in danger, Locke suspects Charlie may be using again. Meanwhile, Sawyer encourages Hurley to act on his attraction to Libby.
description.es: Charlie sueña que la vida de Aaron peligra, y que sólo el bautismo puede salvarlo. Por otra parte, Sawyer ayuda a Hurley en su relación con Libby.

description.en: Some of the island survivors fear that "The Others" may have returned when Sun is greatly injured during a failed kidnapping attempt at her plant garden. Also, the trust barrier becomes very thin between Locke and Jack in terms of locking up the guns and being kept safe. Meanwhile, Sawyer is an amused but highly interested bystander when tension escalates between Jack, Locke, Kate and Ana Lucia. When Jack purposely takes Sawyer's medication from him he pushes more in favor of helping Locke. Lastly, flashbacks reveal more of Sawyer's con artist past.
description.es: Cuando Sun es atacada, la tensión entre los supervivientes se acentúa y surge una lucha interna por el control de las armas.

description.en: After Sun is attacked, some of the survivors begin to think that one of the "other survivors" might be one of "The Others." When French woman Danielle Rousseau leads Sayid to a mysterious captive in the jungle, he becomes determined to find out if he is one of "The Others". Meanwhile, Sawyer discovers Hurley’s potentially devastating breach of the survivors’ trust and blackmails him into helping track an elusive island creature that won’t leave Sawyer alone.
description.es: Rousseau encuentra en la selva a un hombre que parece ser uno de Los Otros. Locke y Sayid se ponen de acuerdo para intentar sonsacarle información, pero todo acaba en una macabra tortura.

description.en: A mysterious illness that baby Aaron suddenly contracts sends a desperate Claire, Kate and French woman Danielle to return to the same area where Claire was initially kidnapped. It is there where she believes she can find a cure for Aaron's illness. In the meantime, Jack and Locke are doing their best to keep their prisoner a secret from the rest of the survivors on the island.
description.es: Cuando Aaron se pone enfermo, Claire, junto con Kate y Rousseau, va en busca del lugar donde ella fue llevada durante su secuestro para buscar medicamentos. Jack y Locke discuten sobre lo que deben hacer con su prisionero.

description.en: Sun comes to the realization that she might be pregnant. She struggles on whether to tell Jin about the situation. Meanwhile, with no success from Jack or Sayid, Ana-Lucia is called in by Locke to interrogate the new prisoner Henry Gale to get more information out of him about the balloon that he and his wife supposedly landed on the island with.
description.es: Sun cree que puede estar embarazada. Ana Lucia parte con Sayid en busca del supuesto globo que respaldaría la coartada de Henry Gale, el prisionero.

description.en: When the hatch suddenly takes on a life of its own, Locke is forced to enlist the help of an unlikely ally to control the matter. Meanwhile, Ana Lucia, Sayid and Charlie go off into the jungle to find out the truth about Henry Gale and see if there really is balloon craft out there in the jungle that carried him and his wife to the island.
description.es: Cuando la escotilla entra en estado de alerta repentinamente, Locke es atrapado por una compuerta y sólo Henry puede pulsar las teclas. La búsqueda del globo finaliza con sorprendentes resultados.

description.en: Libby lends a helping hand to Hurley to support him when he begins to think the island is having a strange effect on him. Hurley begins to see Dave (guest-star Evan Handler, Sex and the City) on the island, who was his friend in the mental institution Hurley was in. Also, Locke's sense of purpose is shaken when the prisoner gives him new information about the hatch.
description.es: Hurley sufre alucinaciones que le hacen comer y comer, e incluso intentar suicidarse, y es ayudado por Libby a superarlas. Locke comienza a tener dudas sobre el funcionamiento de la escotilla.

description.en: Rose is surprisingly and vehemently opposed to Bernard's plan to create an S.O.S. signal; romantic sparks are rekindled between Jack and Kate when they trek into the jungle to propose a "trade" with "The Others"; and Locke begins to question his faith in the island.
description.es: Rose está opuesta completamente al plan de Bernard de crear una gigantesca señal de SOS. Jack y Kate parten para negociar sobre la devolución de Henry a cambio de Walt.

description.en: After finding an exhausted Michael in the forest, Jack and Kate bring him back to the main camp. When he finally wakes up, Michael has some new details about "The Others." Also, a lovestruck Hurley plans a date for Libby.
description.es: Jack y Kate transportan a un exhausto Michael al campamento, quien da noticias sobre la realidad de los otros. Ana Lucía es atacada por Henry Gale y piensa en matarlo, y Hurley prepara su cita con Libby.

description.en: Mr. Eko has dreams about his brother leading him somewhere. He seeks Locke's help in finding a secret location, the "question mark." Meanwhile, Jack and the other survivors grapple with the horrific situation in the hatch with the death of Ana-Lucia and Libby clinging to life.
description.es: El Sr. Eko le pide ayuda a Locke para encontrar un lugar secreto, el cual él cree, tiene todas las respuestas a los misterios de la isla. Mientras tanto, Jack y los otros supervivientes intentan arreglárselas con la terrible situación en la escotilla.

description.en: A determined Michael convinces Jack and several castaways to help him rescue Walt from "The Others." With Jack away, Locke is left in charge of the hatch and must decide if he should believe Henry and not push the button, risking everyone's safety.  Meanwhile, the events that happened to Michael after he left are finally revealed. Meanwhile, Charlie struggles with Eko's decision to discontinue building the church.
description.es: Mientras los supervivientes lloran la pérdida de Ana Lucia y Libby, Michael continúa presionando a sus compañeros para que se le unan en una misión para rescatar a Walt de los Otros.

description.en: After discovering something odd just offshore, Jack and Sayid come up with a plan to confront "The Others" and hopefully get Walt back. At the same time there will be an answer to the question of where Michael has been and resolution of him and Walt. Meanwhile, Eko and Locke come to blows as Locke makes a potentially cataclysmic decision regarding the "button" and the hatch. Lastly, Desmond returns and he sheds some more light on his experience on the island in the three years prior to when Locke came down into that hatch.
description.es: Los eventos llegan a un clímax cuando Michael lleva a sus amigos a través de la Isla para enfrentarse a los Otros. Mientras tanto, Desmond vuelve a la Isla en un velero, y decide junto a Locke ver qué pasa si el contador de El Cisne pasa de cero.

description.en: After discovering something odd just offshore, Jack and Sayid come up with a plan to confront "The Others" and hopefully get Walt back. Meanwhile, Eko and Locke come to blows as Locke makes a potentially cataclysmic decision regarding the "button" and the hatch.
description.es: Jack, Kate, Hurley y Sawyer, guiados por Michael se acercan al campamento de los Otros. En la Escotilla, Desmond y Locke han logrado echar a Eko y se preparan para ver qué ocurre si no pulsan el botón.

description.en: ABC once again invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take another look at one of the most talked about shows. "Destination Lost" will explore the series in a way that will bring new viewers up to date -- but which current viewers will also find illuminating - in anticipation of the series' second season premiere. From the back stories of some of the most interesting characters on television to the mysteries of the island, "Destination Lost" will provide an insightful glimpse into the lives of some of the survivors of the doomed Oceanic Airlines flight 815.
description.es: ABC once again invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take another look at one of the most talked about shows. "Destination Lost" will explore the series in a way that will bring new viewers up to date -- but which current viewers will also find illuminating - in anticipation of the series' second season premiere. From the back stories of some of the most interesting characters on television to the mysteries of the island, "Destination Lost" will provide an insightful glimpse into the lives of some of the survivors of the doomed Oceanic Airlines flight 815.

description.en: Peter Coyote narrates the story of the survivors of Oceanic flight 815. The leader of the tail-end survivors, Ana Lucia, is forced to get her group inland to escape the ruthless 'others'. Meanwhile, the fuselage survivors have to deal with heavily pregnant woman, a mysterious stranger and the discovery of a hatch in the jungle.
description.es: Peter Coyote narrates the story of the survivors of Oceanic flight 815. The leader of the tail-end survivors, Ana Lucia, is forced to get her group inland to escape the ruthless 'others'. Meanwhile, the fuselage survivors have to deal with heavily pregnant woman, a mysterious stranger and the discovery of a hatch in the jungle.

description.en: Episode 0 of season 2
description.es: Episodio 0 de la temporada 2

description.en:
Jack, Kate, and Sawyer are prisoners of the mysterious "Others." After their captors drug them and take blood samples, they are held in separate areas. The camp leaders--Ben (Henry Gale), Mr. Friendly and a new woman, Juliet--try to make the castaways adjust to their new circumstances.

Flashbacks reveal more about Jack's past with his father and his wife Sarah.
description.es: La tercera temporada empieza con Jack, Kate y Sawyer trasladados al campamento principal de los misteriosos Otros y, allí, son retenidos en tres áreas diferentes: mientras el doctor está encerrado en una habitación aislada, Kate y Sawyer son encarcelados en jaulas.

description.en: Sun and Jin's lives are put in danger when Sayid tries to locate Jack and the other missing castaways. Sayid also creates a plan in order to get the attention of the "Others" on the beach. Meanwhile, Henry (i.e. Ben) gives Jack an offer that is very tempting in exchange for his cooperation. Lastly, Kate and Sawyer must adjust to harsh conditions that are being forced upon them by "The Others."
description.es: La vida de Sun y Jin se ponen en peligro cuando Sayid intenta localizar a Jack y a los otros supervivientes desaparecidos. Para ello, el iraquí desarrolla un plan para atraer la atención de los Otros en la playa.

description.en:
Locke, Eko and Desmond are found scattered about the island after the implosion of the hatch. Locke receives a message from the Island asking him to fix the situation he caused.

Hurley returns to the beach camp to report the imprisonment of Kate, Jack and Sawyer by the Others.

Desmond has been fundamentally altered by the implosion, giving him a mysterious new power.
description.es: Los destinos de Locke, Eko y Desmond se revelan en el momento en el que la escotilla vuela por los aires y ellos se encuentran dispersos por la misteriosa isla. Por su parte, Hurley llega al campamento base e informa de la captura de Kate, Jack y Sawyer.

description.en: The Others prevent Sawyer and Kate from escaping, leaving Sawyer perplexed by the extent of the measures taken to keep them imprisoned. Jack is asked to use his medical training to save the life of one of the Others. At the beach, Desmond's strange behavior attracts attention. He begins to construct a mysterious device.
description.es: Los Otros previenen a Sawyer y a Kate de lo que les puede pasar si escapan y dejan al estafador perplejo por las excesivas medidas de seguridad que esta tribu manejan para mantenerles presos.

description.en: A delirious Eko wrestles with past demons; some of the castaways go to the Pearl station to find a computer they can use to locate Jack, Kate and Sawyer; Jack does not know who to trust when two of the Others are at odds with each other.
description.es: Un delirante Eko empezará un viaje metafísico en el que deberá luchar con los demonios de su pasado. Por su parte, Jack no sabe en quién confiar cuando Los Otros empiezan a discutir entre sí.

description.en: Jack makes a decision regarding Ben's offer. Sawyer's life is placed in danger when Pickett decides to make good on his threat. Locke discovers a hidden message that may help unlock the island's secrets. Kate recalls memories from the past, which caused her to make an important choice.
description.es: Después de meditarlo, Jack toma una decisión ante la oferta de Ben. Quizás a esa decisión le ayuda una visita que le brinda Kate, en la que le suplica que opere a Ben, ya que la vida de Sawyer depende de ello.

description.en: Jack has the Others in a desperate situation as he holds Ben's life in his hands.  Meanwhile, Kate and Sawyer try to escape from their captors. Flashbacks reveal Juliet's past as a medical researcher in Miami.
description.es: Jack tiene a los Otros en una situación desesperada, pues la vida de Ben está en sus manos. Mientras tanto, Kate y Sawyer intentan escapar de sus captores, y son ayudados por Juliet, quien recuerda su pasado como investigadora médica.

description.en: After Desmond rescues Claire from drowning, Charlie gets Hurley to help him find out why Desmond has seemed able to predict the future. Desmond recalls exactly what took place in the moments after he turns the key, where he experienced a strange vision of his life prior to his Army days.
description.es: Después de que Desmond la rescate de morir ahogada en el mar, Charlie, celoso, convence a Hurley para que le ayude a descubrir porque Desmond parece que prediga el futuro.

description.en: As Kate and Sawyer journey back to the main island with Karl, who is exhibiting effects of the brainwashing video, they argue over whether to go back and save Jack. On Hydra island, as Juliet's fate rests in his hands and a power struggle within the Others ensues, Jack recollects the time he spent in Phuket, Thailand and his relationship with Achara, a mysterious tattoo artist.
description.es: Mientras Kate y Sawyer están de camino a su campamento junto con Karl, que está empezando a dar síntomas del lavado de cerebro que le hicieron los Otros, empiezan a discutir si deben ir a rescatar a Jack o dejarlo en manos de esta misteriosa tribu.

description.en: Kate is still struggling over their decision to leave Jack in the hands of the Others as she and Sawyer return to their camp.  Meanwhile, Hurley finds an old van in the jungle and attempts to use it to help a fellow survivor in need of faith and hope.  Flashbacks reveal more of Hurley's tumultuous past with the numbers curse.
description.es: Kate aún se resiste a dejar a Jack en manos de Los Otros, mientras ella y Sawyer vuelven al campamento base. Mientras tanto, Hurley está desolado por la trágica muerte de Libby, y, creyendo que está maldito, intenta alejarse de todo sus compañeros.

description.en: On their mission to rescue Jack, Kate, Sayid, and Locke stumble upon a mysterious structure surrounded by farm animals and meet its strange inhabitant. Back at the camp, in order to reclaim his belongings, Sawyer plays in a ping-pong competition.
description.es: Kate, Sayid, Rousseau y Locke siguen buscando a Jack. Durante su incursión por la selva, se topan con una misteriosa antena parabólica gigante que está situada en una aparente granja de animales. La exploración del terreno les hará conocer a un extraño habitante.

description.en: Claire has an idea to send a message to the outside world. Charlie, however, is resistant to the idea, and Desmond tries to sabotage the plan. As Claire tries to get the truth behind their actions out of the pair, she remembers traumatic events from her past. Meanwhile, the rescue party encounters a dangerous obstacle.
description.es: Cuando ve a unas gaviotas con marcas en las patas, Claire deduce que son observadas por biólogos. Así, a la chica se le ocurre una idea para enviar un mensaje al exterior. Charlie se muestra reticente; mientras Desmond trata por todos modos de sabotear el plan.

description.en: When Kate and Locke arrive at the Others' camp, Ben promises to tell Locke the island's secrets as long as he stops his destructive plan, and Kate's reunion with Jack doesn't go very well when she learns that the Others have offered him a deal. More of Locke's troubled past is revealed.
description.es: Kate y Locke llegan al campamento de Los Otros. Por una parte, Locke se encuentra con Ben. El jefe de Los Otros quiere detener al superviviente de su destructiva misión. Por otro lado, Kate no para hasta que encuentra a Jack. Su cara a cara no va como ella esperaba.

description.en: As the truth about Sun's kidnapping by "the Others" comes to her attention, Hurley becomes suspicious of Sawyer's attempt to reveal the mystery behind two fellow survivors, Nikki and Paulo. Through series of flashbacks we will discover what Nikki and Paulo were doing before the crash and how they survived 65 days on the island.
description.es: Las aventuras de los supervivientes dan un pequeño alto para explicar la historia de Nikki y Paulo. Cuando se los encuentran muertos, el resto de los pasajeros intentan reconstruir qué ha podido suceder para que la pareja haya terminado con este trágico final.

description.en: Kate and Juliet are stranded in the jungle after Kate learns that there is a traitor in the survivor's midst. Meanwhile, Sawyer's poor attitude and selfish ways towards the beach community may earn him a vote of banishment if he doesn't have a change of heart.
description.es: Kate es forzada a quedarse en la selva con Juliet. Hurley le advierte a Sawyer de que deberá cambiar sus formas de actuar y su carácter o se verá destinado al destierro.

description.en: The celebration of Jack's return is cut short when he arrives at the beach with an Other, Juliet, whose flashbacks pick up from where they left off, showing us how she got onto the island and became an other. Meanwhile, Claire is threatened by a strange illness.
description.es: Jack vuelve al campamento, pero nadie está para celebraciones cuando ven que el médico va acompañado de Juliet. Mientras la ex integrante de Los Otros busca una manera de integrarse con sus nuevos compañeros, va recordando cómo acabó viviendo en la isla.

description.en: Desmond convinces Hurley, Jin, and Charlie to follow him on a trek through the jungle after he receives a series of visions. Flashbacks reveal the time that Desmond spent with a cloister of monks. Meanwhile, a despondent Kate turns to Sawyer for companionship after seeing Jack and Juliet together.
description.es: Charlie pisa la cuerda de una trampa Rousseau y se le dispara una flecha que le atraviesa el cuello, Desmond trata de salvarlo pero muere en sus brazos. El escocés tenido otra visión sobre la muerte de Charlie y parece que esta vez quiere que se cumpla.

description.en: Sun allows Juliet to examine her when she learns that all of "The Others" pregnant woman died before they gave birth on the island. Meanwhile, Desmond and an unlikely nemesis collaborate to save a new island inhabitant's life.
description.es: Sun descubre lo que pasa a las mujeres que se han quedado embarazadas en la isla, por lo que accede a ser examinada por Juliet. Mientras tanto, en medio de la jungla, la mujer del paracaídas se está muriendo y Desmond y Charlie discuten sobre qué deben hacer.

description.en: After abandoning the Others, Locke takes Sawyer on a trek through the jungle to help him eliminate a common enemy. Meanwhile, back at the beach, the parachutist Naomi has crucial information about flight 815.
description.es: Después de abandonar a Los Otros, Locke coge a Sawyer y empiezan un viaje por la jungla que tiene un objetivo: eliminar a un enemigo común. Mientras tanto, en la playa, la chica del paracaídas tiene una información crucial sobre el vuelo 815.

description.en: Ben unwillingly divulges information to Locke about the island, taking him on a journey to various locations including strange monuments and the mysterious Jacob. Back at the beach, Juliet's secret is revealed. Flashbacks will show us the origins of DHARMA and the history of the island, including 'the purge.'
description.es: Locke se enfrenta a Ben y le pide que le lleva hasta Jacob, uno de los misterios más escalofriantes de la isla. En el campamento de los sobrevivientes, Sawyer hace escuchar a Sayid la grabación de Juliet, y quieren explicaciones de la médico.

description.en:
While Jack devises a plan to do away with "The Others" once and for all, Sayid uncovers a flaw in "The Others'" system that could lead to everyone's rescue. But it requires Charlie to take on a dangerous task that may make Desmond's premonition come true.

A Charlie-centric episode.
description.es: Charlie realiza una lista de los mejores momentos de su vida, mientras Desmond, otra vez, tiene una visión sobre la defunción del músico británico. Esta vez, no obstante, Charlie no piensa huir y se plantea plantar cara a la muerte.

description.en: The season 3 finale finds the castaways preparing for an invasion by the slightly less mysterious Others, while Charlie and Desmond find more than they were looking for in the underwater "Looking Glass Hatch".
description.es: La emboscada de Los Otros no va tal y como se había planeado y termina con la captura de Sayid, Jin y Bernard. Por otro lado, Ben ha sido informado de la presencia de Charlie en la estación del espejo y, por eso, envía a Mikhail para que acabe con esta intromisión.

description.en: The season 3 finale finds the castaways preparing for an invasion by the slightly less mysterious Others, while Charlie and Desmond find more than they were looking for in the underwater "Looking Glass Hatch".
description.es: En la estación subacuática del Espejo, Charlie y Desmond tratan de encontrar una manera de desmantelar el bloqueo de la señal que evita que los habitantes puedan mantener comunicaciones con el mundo exterior.
