description.en: They thought they had met the enemy. They thought they had seen evil. They thought wrong. As the new season begins, the survivors feel that rescue is close at hand, but they don't know whether or not to believe Charlie's final message that the people claiming to liberate them are not who they seem to be. As unlikely alliances are formed, those they thought could be trusted may turn against them, as the enemy of their enemy becomes their friend. But who can be trusted? Is rescue really as close as it seems?
description.es: Después de 93 días viviendo en esta misteriosa isla, los supervivientes ven que el rescate es casi una realidad, pero lo miran con cierta desconfianza, ya que no saben si creer o no el mensaje final que Charlie hizo llegar a Desmond antes de morir.

description.en: The survivors begin to question the intentions of their supposed rescuers when four strangers arrive on the island.
description.es: Cuatro extraños llegan a la isla y los supervivientes se preguntan si realmente ellos han venido para rescatarles o tienen otra misión diferente.

description.en: Locke's hostage may be the key to getting off the island, so Sayid and Kate go in search of their fellow castaway in an attempt to negotiate a peaceful deal.
description.es: La rehén de Locke, Charlotte Lewis, puede ser la clave para salir de la isla, así que Sayid y Kate van en su búsqueda en un intento de negociar un trato de manera pacífica.

description.en: Kate needs to get information out of the hostages, but it may jeopardize her standing with Locke -- as well as with Sawyer. Meanwhile in the future Kate's Court hearings take place.
description.es: La necesidad de Kate de conseguir información del rehén del grupo del campamento de Los Otros, podría causar problemas con el nuevo líder de la aldea, Locke, y también con Sawyer.

description.en: Sayid and Desmond hit a bit of turbulence on the way to the freighter, which causes Desmond to experience some unexpected side effects.
description.es: Desmond y Sayid viajan hacia el carguero, cuando una turbulencia causa extraños efectos en el escocés. Éste descubre que los viajes en el tiempo que experimenta podrían incluso matarlo si no encuentra una constante que una su pasado con el presente.

description.en: Juliet receives an unwelcome visit from someone from her past and is given orders to track down Charlotte and Faraday in order to stop them from completing their mission -- by any means necessary. Meanwhile, Ben offers Locke an enticing deal.
description.es: Juliet recibe una visita no deseada de alguien de su pasado que le ordena vigilar a Charlotte y Faraday, con el objetivo de impedirles el cumplimiento de su misión.

description.en: Juliet is forced to reveal some startling news to Jin when Sun threatens to move to Locke's camp. Meanwhile, Sayid and Desmond begin to get an idea of the freighter's crew when they meet the ship's captain.
description.es: Juliet es forzada a revelar ciertas noticias alarmantes a Jin cuando Sun amenaza con moverse al campo de Locke. Mientras tanto, Sayid y Desmond tienen una idea de la misión del equipo del carguero cuando conocen al capitán de la nave.

description.en: Sayid confronts Ben's spy on the freighter, and Ben urges daughter Alex to flee Locke's camp in order to survive an impending attack.
description.es: Después del encuentro entre Michael y Sayid, la historia de cómo el espía de Ben llegó hasta el carguero finalmente es revelada. Mientras, en el campamento de Locke, Ben envía a su hija a un lugar más seguro para que sobreviva a un posible ataque de la gente de Widmore.

title.en: The Shape of Things to Come

description.en: Jack tries to discover the identity of a body that has washed ashore. Meanwhile, Locke's camp is attacked by Ben's adversaries.
description.es: Jack intenta descubrir la identidad del cuerpo que ha aparecido en la playa arrastrado por el mar. Mientras tanto, el campamento de Locke es atacado por los enemigos de Ben.

description.en: Kate and Juliet must learn to work together when Jack's health is seriously compromised, and something goes wrong as Sawyer, Claire, Aaron and Miles continue their trek away from Locke's camp and back to the beach
description.es: Kate y Juliet deben trabajar juntas cuando la salud de Jack empeora y peligra la vida del doctor. En el otro grupo de supervivientes, algo va mal y Sawyer, Claire, Aaron y Miles, huyen del campamento y se dirigen de nuevo a la playa.

description.en: Locke finds out where Jacob's cabin is. Life on the freighter becomes dangerous.
description.es: Locke, Hurley y Ben siguen buscando la cabaña de Jacob cuando John tiene un sueño revelador que les permitirá llegar a ella. En el carguero, el mercenario Keamy regresa enfurecido por su fracaso en el asalto a las barracas de la isla.

title.es: Como en casa en ningún sitio (Parte 1)

description.en: Sayid goes back to the island to bring the rest of the people to the freighter. Ben, Locke, and Hurley go to another Dharma station in order to "move the island".
description.es: Jack y Kate siguen la señal del teléfono que el piloto ha dejado caer desde el helicóptero. Por el camino se encuentran con Sawyer, Aaron y Miles, que huyen de las barracas. Mientras tanto, Sayid llega a la playa con la zodiac para empezar a llevar gente al carguero.

title.es: Como en casa en ningún sitio (Parte 2)

description.en: The face-off between the survivors and the freighter people continues, and the Oceanic Six find themselves closer to rescue.
description.es: Jack y Sawyer se dirigen a la estación La Orquídea, donde se encuentran con Locke y Hugo. Por otro lado, Ben se entrega al mercenario Keamy, quien lo mantiene prisionero. Mientras regresan a la playa, Kate y Sayid son capturados por los hombres de Linus.

description.en: As the face-off between the survivors and the freighter people continues, the Oceanic Six find themselves closer to rescue.
description.es: As the face-off between the survivors and the freighter people continues, the Oceanic Six find themselves closer to rescue.

description.en: ABC once again invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take another look at one of the most talked about and critically acclaimed shows. "LOST: Past, Present & Future" will explore the series in a way that will bring new viewers up to date -- but which current viewers will also find illuminating - in anticipation of the fourth season premiere episode. The special will take an in-depth look at the mysteries of both the island and its inhabitants and recap the secrets that have been revealed, as well as those that remain unanswered. "
description.es: ABC once again invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take another look at one of the most talked about and critically acclaimed shows. "LOST: Past, Present & Future" will explore the series in a way that will bring new viewers up to date -- but which current viewers will also find illuminating - in anticipation of the fourth season premiere episode. The special will take an in-depth look at the mysteries of both the island and its inhabitants and recap the secrets that have been revealed, as well as those that remain unanswered. "

description.en: Episode 0 of season 4
description.es: Episodio 0 de la temporada 4

description.en: The remaining island survivors start to feel the effects of the aftermath of moving the island, and Jack and Ben begin their quest to reunite the Oceanic 6 in order to return to the island with Locke's body in an attempt to save their former fellow castaways.
description.es: La quinta temporada empieza con los supervivientes que se quedaron en la isla comenzando a sufrir los efectos de que esta se moviera. Por su parte, Jack y Ben quieren reunir a los seis del Oceanic con el fin de regresar a la isla.

description.en: Hurley and Sayid are on the run from the cops after stumbling into trouble at the safehouse; the island survivors come under attack by unknown forces; and an old friend offers some shocking advice to Kate in order to ensure that "the lie" remain a secret.
description.es: Hurley lleva al inconsciente Sayid a su casa tratando de huir de la policía. Mientras tanto, Kate y Aaron continúan su huída de los abogados y visitan a Sun. Los supervivientes de la isla son atacados en la playa por fuerzas desconocidas.

description.en: Desmond looks for a woman who might be the key to helping Faraday stop the island's unpredictable movements through time; Locke finds out who has been attacking the survivors.
description.es: Desmond busca a una misteriosa mujer, la madre de Daniel Faraday, quien puede parar los viajes a través del tiempo que está realizando la isla. En su búsqueda, descubre que Faraday -financiado por Charles Widmore- estaba experimentando con los viajes en el tiempo.

description.en: Kate discovers that someone knows the secret of Aaron's true parental lineage. Meanwhile, the dramatic shifts through time are placing the lives of the remaining island survivors in extreme peril.
description.es: Kate descubre que alguien sabe el secreto de Aaron. Preocupada por el hecho de que alguien le quite la custodia del pequeño retoño de Claire. Mientras tanto, unos efectos secundarios de los viajes en el tiempo amenazan la salud de los supervivientes de la isla.

description.en: Locke shoulders the burden of ending the island's increasingly violent movements through time; Ben is stymied in his efforts to reunite the Oceanic 6 and bring them back to the island.
description.es: Locke asume la responsabilidad de detener los cada vez más violentos saltos de tiempo en la isla. Por eso, quiere llevar a Sawyer, Juliet, Miles, Charlotte y Daniel Faraday a la estación La Orquídea.

description.en: The members of Oceanic 6 discover how to get back to the island, but not all of them want to return.
description.es: Eloise Hawking muestra a los seis de Oceanic la forma de volver a la isla, pero no todos quieren regresar.

title.en: The Life and Death of Jeremy Bentham
title.es: La vida y muerte de Jeremy Bentham

description.en: Locke's mission off the island as Jeremy is revealed.
description.es: La misión que Locke debe realizar fuera de la isla es revelada. Para ello, adoptará el nombre de Jeremy Bentham.

description.en: Sawyer perpetuates a lie with some of the other island survivors in order to protect themselves from mistakes of the past.
description.es: Los saltos en el tiempo se han parado y Sawyer, Juliet, Miles, Jin y Faraday se han quedado en 1974. Mientras traspasan uno de los bosques de la isla, se topan con una pareja de la iniciativa Dharma que está a punto de ser ejecutada.

description.en: After meeting old acquaintances Sawyer is forced to continue lying to protect them.
description.es: Tras el encuentro con Jack, Kate y Hugo, Sawyer les explica que están en 1977 y que ahora son miembros de la Iniciativa Dharma. Para arropar a sus antiguos compañeros, el ex convicto decide crear una tapadera para que ellos puedan integrarse también al grupo.

description.en: Everyone on the island is at risk when one of the survivors decides to go against them and taking matters into their own hands.
description.es: Todos los supervivientes del vuelo Oceanic se encuentran en peligro cuando uno de ellos decide ir por su cuenta y tomarse la justicia por su mano.

description.en: Kate goes to extreme measures to save Ben's life when Jack refuses to help. Meanwhile, Kate begins to tell the truth about the lie in order to protect Aaron.
description.es: Jin se despierta y ve a Ben inconsciente y cubierto de sangre. El coreano lo mete dentro la caravana y lo lleva hacia el campamento de la Dharma. Allí, Kate, Sawyer y Juliet arriesgarán su estable vida para salvar la vida de Ben, ya que Jack se niega a operarle.

description.en: To atone for sins of the past, Ben must attempt to summon the smoke monster in order to be judged.
description.es: Para expiar los pecados del pasado, Ben debe intentar invocar al monstruo de humo para ser juzgado.

description.en: Suspicions about a possible breach intensify after Ben is taken from the infirmary, and a reluctant Miles is forced to work with Hurley when he's asked to deliver an important package to a top Dharma official.
description.es: Tras el secuestro del joven Ben, quien ha sido llevado al campamento de los hostilos por Kate y Sawyer, empiezan las sospechas por parte de los miembros de la Dharma de que ha sido un golpe desde dentro y de que hay un topo entre ellos.

description.en: On the 100th episode milestone for the series, the time of reckoning has begun when Daniel Faraday comes clean regarding what he knows about the island.
description.es: Daniel Faraday desvela por fin qué es lo que sabe sobre la isla.

description.en: Jack and Kate find themselves at odds over the direction to take to save their fellow island survivors, Locke further solidifies his stance as leader of "The Others," and Sawyer and Juliet come under scrutiny from the Dharma Initiative.
description.es: Jack y Kate se encuentran solos a la hora de defender su postura sobre qué hacer para salvar a sus compañeros supervivientes de la isla. Sawyer y Juliet se tendrán que someter al juicio de los jefes de la Iniciativa Dharma al haber roto las reglas de convivencia.

description.en: Jack's decision to put a plan in action in order to set things right on the island is met with some strong resistance by those close to him, and Locke assigns Ben a difficult task.
description.es: Jack encontrará una fuerte oposición que no querrá tirar adelante su plan para que todo vuelva a la normalidad en la isla.

description.en: Jack's decision to put a plan in action in order to set things right on the island is met with some strong resistance by those close to him, and Locke assigns Ben a difficult task.
description.es: Jack encontrará una fuerte oposición que no querrá tirar adelante su plan para que todo vuelva a la normalidad en la isla.

description.en: ABC once again invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take another look at one of the most talked about and critically acclaimed shows. "Lost Clip Show" (working title) will explore the series in a way that will bring new viewers up to date -- but which current viewers will also find illuminating - in anticipation of the two-hour fifth season premiere. The special will take an in-depth look at the mysteries of the island, its inhabitants, the Oceanic 6, outside influences such as Charles Widmore, and also delve into some of the questions that have been answered, and others that still remain a mystery.
description.es: ABC once again invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take another look at one of the most talked about and critically acclaimed shows. "Lost Clip Show" (working title) will explore the series in a way that will bring new viewers up to date -- but which current viewers will also find illuminating - in anticipation of the two-hour fifth season premiere. The special will take an in-depth look at the mysteries of the island, its inhabitants, the Oceanic 6, outside influences such as Charles Widmore, and also delve into some of the questions that have been answered, and others that still remain a mystery.

description.en: Episode 0 of season 5
description.es: Episodio 0 de la temporada 5

description.en: ABC once again invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take another look at one of the most talked about and critically acclaimed shows. "Lost: A Journey in Time" will explore the series in a way that will bring new viewers up to date -- but which current viewers will also find illuminating - in discovering how the Oceanic 6 were able to get back to the island, what happened to the survivors left behind during the three years after Ben moved the island, and the fate of Locke.
description.es: ABC once again invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take another look at one of the most talked about and critically acclaimed shows. "Lost: A Journey in Time" will explore the series in a way that will bring new viewers up to date -- but which current viewers will also find illuminating - in discovering how the Oceanic 6 were able to get back to the island, what happened to the survivors left behind during the three years after Ben moved the island, and the fate of Locke.

description.en: Two outcomes of the detonation of the hydrogen bomb are presented. Flight 815 lands safely at LAX, where Kate escapes from the marshal and Jack learns that his father's body was lost in transit.
description.es: La serie de culto "Perdidos" empieza su sexta y última temporada con este episodio que empieza a aclarar las dudas de los espectadores y muestra las consecuencias de la detonación, por parte de Juliet, de la bomba de hidrógeno.

description.en: Jack, Sawyer, Kate, Miles and Hurley, struggling to save Sayid, face an ancient secret. Meanwhile, a fake Locke exits the chamber to everyone's awe.
description.es: Parte del grupo de Jack parte hacia el templo, guiado por Jin. Una vez en las ruinas, los supervivientes del Oceanic son capturados por una banda que les lleva hacia el edificio principal, habitado por una variopinta comunidad.

description.en: When Sawyer escapes from the temple, Kate and Jin are sent to bring him back. Meanwhile, the Others determine Sayid is infected and attempt to poison him. In the flash sideways, Kate, still on the run, takes Claire to a hospital when she goes into labor.
description.es: Sawyer aprovecha una discusión entre la gente del templo y sus compañeros para hacerse con un arma y escapar. Pese a pedir que no le sigan, Kate, Jin y dos de los captores hacen caso omiso y salen en su búsqueda. Jack, Hugo y Miles se quedan al cuidado de Sayid.

description.en: On the island, the Man in Black attempts to recruit Sawyer in his attempt to leave the island, while an impromptu funeral is held for the real Locke. In the flash sideways, Locke is fired from his job and becomes a substitute teacher.
description.es: El humo negro recorre la isla para reclutar a supervivientes que se unan a su causa. Mientras tanto, en la playa, después de enterrar el cuerpo de John Locke, Iliana convence a Sun y a Lapidus para ir al templo, el único lugar seguro de la isla.

description.en: On Jacob's orders, Hurley leads Jack to a lighthouse. Meanwhile, Claire questions an Other she has captured while tending to an injured Jin. In the flash sideways, Jack is a single father trying to bond with his son.
description.es: Hurley debe convencer a Jack para que le acompañe en una misión que le ha encargado Jacob. Por otro lado, en la selva, Jin está herido y recibe la ayuda de Claire, quien actúa de un modo muy extraño.

description.en: After recruiting Sayid to his cause, the Man in Black issues an ultimatum to the Others: either join him or die. Meanwhile, Kate is reunited with Claire. In the flash sideways, Sayid helps his brother, who is in debt to a loan shark.
description.es: Sayid debe hacer frente a una difícil decisión, mientras que Claire envía una advertencia a los habitantes del templo.

description.en: Ilana discovers Ben killed Jacob, so she plans to kill him. Meanwhile, Jack, Hurley and a suicidal Richard visit the Black Rock. In the flash sideways, Ben, a high school teacher, tries to blackmail the school's principal.
description.es: Ben deberá afrontar las consecuencias de una mentira oculta durante demasiado tiempo. Y es que Ilana, gracias a los poderes de Miles, descubre quién fue el verdadero asesino de Jacob.

description.en: The Man in Black sends Sawyer on a reconnaissance mission to Hydra Island, where he discovers that Charles Widmore has returned to the island with a team of scientists. In the flash sideways, Sawyer is a lonely cop who is still searching for the original Sawyer.
description.es: El humo negro, tras la apariencia de John Locke, vuelve del templo con todo su nuevo séquito. En el campamento le esperan Jin y Sawyer. El ex convicto se encara con la némesis de Jacob porque quiere respuestas. Entonces Locke confiará a Sawyer una misión decisiva...

description.en: Richard Alpert's back story is shown: In 1867, he is brought to the island on the Black Rock as a slave. He makes a deal with Jacob to be his representative in exchange for immortality. In the present day, Hurley convinces him to help the candidates replace Jacob and stop the Man in Black from leaving the Island.
description.es: Richard Alpert se enfrenta a un difícil dilema: decidir en qué lado luchará. Y es que el consejero de Jacob deberá escoger si continúa haciendo caso a Jacob o unirse a la tropa comandada por el humo negro.

description.en: After Jin is kidnapped and taken to Hydra Island by Widmore's team, the Man in Black confronts Widmore. On the main island, Sun loses her ability to speak English. In the flash sideways, Sun and Jin are abducted after failing to complete a transaction for Sun's father.
description.es: Han pasado muchas cosas desde que Sun volvió a la isla, y aún así su destino y el de su marido caminan por sendas muy distintas. Ella se mantiene del lado de los fieles a Jacob. Él, herido, continúa en el bando del falso Locke, al que fue arrastrado por Claire.

description.en: On the island, Widmore subjects Desmond to a large amount of electromagnetic energy as an experiment. In the flash sideways, Desmond, with the aid of Charlie, starts to have visions of his life in the original timeline.
description.es: Desmond, el hombre viajó en el espacio y el tiempo en busca de la mujer que amaba, ha sido devuelto a una isla que detesta, y que le aleja de nuevo de Penny. Por si fuera poco, Charles Widmore pretende utilizarle como conejillo de indias en un peligroso experimento.

description.en: In order to prevent more loss of life, Hurley leads the other survivors to speak with the Man in Black. In the flash sideways, Hurley meets Libby, while Desmond continues his mission to let the Oceanic 815 passengers know of their lives on the island.
description.es: Las vidas de Hugo en las dos realidades no pueden ser más distintas. En la isla es un joven atormentado por su mala suerte. En Los Ángeles, en cambio, es un afortunado hombre de negocios al que la vida le sonríe, y al que nunca le ha sucedido nada malo.

description.en: The survivors split into two groups; one led by Sawyer, the other by the Man in Black. Sawyer's group travels to Hydra Island, where they are captured by Widmore's crew after Sun and Jin are reunited. In the flash sideways, the passengers of Oceanic 815 continue to cross paths with each other.
description.es: Jack, Hurley, Sun y Lapidus comienzan a relacionarse con el grupo liderado por el falso Locke. Su introducción pronto será interrumpida por los secuaces de Widmore, que amenazan con bombardear el campamento si no les devuelven a Desmond.

description.en: After the remaining survivors are reunited, Sawyer and Jack hatch a plan to divert the Man in Black's attention and leave the island without him on Widmore's submarine, but disastrous consequences await them. In the flash sideways, Jack investigates the cause of Locke's paralysis and offers treatment.
description.es: Jack desconfía de las intenciones del falso Locke cuando éste le encomienda una difícil tarea: convencer a sus amigos de que deben salir de la isla todos juntos.

description.en: Jacob and the Man in Black are revealed to be twin brothers. They are raised by a mysterious woman who is charged with protecting the island. As revenge for the murder of their adoptive mother (who killed their real mother), Jacob throws his brother into the source of electromagnetism after being made the island's guardian, which transforms the Man in Black into the smoke monster.
description.es: Una joven embarazada logra arrastrarse del agua hasta la playa. Se trata de una de las pocas supervivientes de un naufragio. Allí, la mujer tiene dos hijos: uno, rubio, muy pacífico; el otro, moreno, que convertirá en su objetivo vital el abandonar la isla.

description.en: Ben finally takes his revenge on Widmore after accepting the Man in Black's request for assistance. Jacob explains the purpose of the candidates, and Jack volunteers to take his place. The search for Desmond reveals that he has been rescued and the Man in Black plans to use him to destroy the island. In the flash sideways, each person ends up on their way to a concert.
description.es: Los supervivientes de la explosión del submarino aún no se hacen a la idea de que Sayid, Lapidus, Sun y Jin hayan muerto. El grupo comandado por Jack debe sobreponerse al drama y seguir adelante. Su siguiente misión es liberar a Desmond.

description.en: For different reasons, Jack and the Man in Black both use Desmond to extinguish the light at the heart of the island. The island starts disintegrating, but The Man in Black is also made mortal. Still desperate to escape, The Man in Black fights Jack and mortally wounds him, but with help from Kate, Jack kills him. Realizing his destiny, Jack sacrifices himself to relight the heart of the island, so his friends can escape on the Ajira plane. Hurley takes Jack's place as protector of the island and makes Ben the new advisor. The flash sideways is revealed to be a type of limbo, or holding pattern, for the main characters, where they reside until accepting their life and death, and are then able to "let go" and "move on" together.
description.es: El falso Locke prosigue la búsqueda de Desmond con la intención de utilizarle para destruir la isla y marcharse por fin. Jack también busca al australiano, pero en su caso, para utilizarlo como arma en el inminente enfrentamiento final contra el humo negro.

description.en: Locke puts his plan into action, which could liberate him from the island.
description.es: Locke puts his plan into action, which could liberate him from the island.

description.en: Episode 0 of season 6
description.es: Episodio 0 de la temporada 6

description.en: ABC invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take a final glance at one of television's most talked about and critically acclaimed shows. The "Lost" Series Finale Event begins with this two-hour special, which takes a retrospective look back over the past six seasons of this groundbreaking series.
description.es: ABC invites new and avid "Lost" viewers to take a final glance at one of television's most talked about and critically acclaimed shows. The "Lost" Series Finale Event begins with this two-hour special, which takes a retrospective look back over the past six seasons of this groundbreaking series.

title.en: Epilogue: The New Man in Charge
title.es: Epilogue: The New Man in Charge

description.en: The New Man in Charge" is a mini-episode that follows the events of LOST's series finale which show what happened to Hurley and Ben.
description.es: The New Man in Charge" is a mini-episode that follows the events of LOST's series finale which show what happened to Hurley and Ben.

plot.en: Set in 1960-1970 New York, this sexy, stylized and provocative drama follows the lives of the ruthlessly competitive men and women of Madison Avenue advertising.
plot.es: El drama trata de una de las agencias de publicidad más prestigiosas de Nueva York a principios de los años sesenta, y se enfoca en el misterioso pero talentoso Donald Draper.

description.en: In 1960 New York City - the high-powered and glamorous "Golden Age" of advertising - Don Draper, the biggest ad man in the business, struggles to stay a step ahead of the rapidly changing times and the young executives nipping at his heels.
description.es: Nueva York. Don Draper es líder creativo de una agencia de publicidad. Don se prepara para ganar la cuenta de una importante tabacalera.

description.en: Don continues to conceal his increasingly complicated personal life, even in the face of Roger Sterling's invitation to open up. Meanwhile, Peggy pines for the absent Pete  still on his honeymoon  while fending off the advances of several of the men of Sterling Cooper.
description.es: Mientras Don continúa ocultando su complicada vida privada, insiste en que debe involucrarse en la campaña presidencial de Nixon.

description.en: Pete returns from his honeymoon, excited about his new marriage, but conflicted about his past encounter with Peggy. After his business relationship with Rachel takes an unforeseen turn, Don attends a party which further illuminates his increasing dissatisfaction with his present life.
description.es: Al regreso de su luna de miel, Pete empieza a preocuparse por lo que pasó con Peggy. Don se siente descontento con su vida.

description.en: Pete's professional and personal lives become more complicated as he struggles to assert power in both. While facing pressure from his wife regarding a new apartment, he further alienates Don and endangers his own position at Sterling Cooper.
description.es: La vida profesional y personal de Pete cada vez se complica más: Cuando intenta sobrepasar su autoridad, Don le da una dura lección.

description.en: After Don wins an award, his photo is featured in Advertising Age. Don must deal with the fallout as the photo brings back a past he isnt ready to confront. Ken gets a short story published in The Atlantic Monthly, inciting jealousy among his colleagues and driving Pete to make an unorthodox request of his wife. Peggy overhears a startling conversation in the office and shares the secret with Joan.
description.es: Don Draper se estremece, cuando su pasado sale a la luz. Se encontrará con Adam un hombre que dice ser su hermano menor.

description.en: A taboo office romance is revealed. At a brainstorming session, Peggy proves to be more than a secretary, opening up new opportunities for her at Sterling Cooper. Meanwhile, Rachel faces her conflicted feelings for Don after he seeks out her advice on a new campaign.
description.es: La agencia trata de ganar un contrato publicitario que busca promover el turismo en Israel. Sin embargo Don y su equipo tendrán un problema al descubrir que ninguno sabe lo suficiente sobre Israel así que buscarán refuerzos en Rachel Menken.

description.en: Roger joins Don for an evening of dinner and drinking, during which Roger's behavior leads to a rift in their friendship. Though Don accepts his apology, there are further consequences for Roger. Pete faces trouble at home as he continues to struggle with the demands of his new marriage.
description.es: Una noche, Roger y Don van a cenar y, luego de unos tragos, el comportamiento de Roger abre una grieta profunda en la amistad ambos.

description.en: Don is tormented as pieces of his secretive past begin to haunt him. Peggy's new success at work, and resulting boost in confidence, threaten her office relationship. Salvatore Romano gets a little too close with a client.
description.es: Mientras el misterioso pasado de Don empieza a atormentarlo, la relación que existe entre Salvatore y un cliente es cuestionada.

description.en: A rival ad agency courts Don, involving Betty in their attempt to lure him from Sterling Cooper. As the presidential campaign heats up, the agency looks for new ways to counter the latest Kennedy ads. Tempers flare over Peggy.
description.es: La agencia se deberá tomar nuevas acciones en la campaña de Nixon, para neutralizar un acertado anuncio de la campaña de Kennedy.

description.en: Don loses an account. Roger, stuck in the city for Labor Day weekend, attempts to cheer him up. Meanwhile, Joan has a night out on the town with her roommate.
description.es: Tras perder una importante cuenta, Don se siente abrumado, pero Roger intenta animarlo. Por su parte, Joan sale a pasear por la ciudad.

description.en: Peggy is given a difficult assignment. Roger's work problems provide new opportunities for Don, and Pete grows more frustrated. Betty finds a new outlet for her growing dissatisfaction.
description.es: A Peggy le asignan un difícil proyecto. Mientras los problemas de Roger proporcionan nuevas oportunidades para Don.

description.en: On election night, the Sterling Cooper staff pulls a rowdy all-nighter while watching the returns. Pete's ambitions cause him to directly challenge Don. Don remembers his past as a soldier in the Korean War.
description.es: Durante la noche de las elecciones de Kennedy vs. Nixon, la tensión aumenta entre el personal de la agencia. Entretanto, Pete desafía a Don.

description.en: As Thanksgiving approaches, Don's work responsibilities interfere with his domestic life. Peggy is given a new opportunity, provoking the ire of some of her colleagues. Betty makes a startling discovery.
description.es: La responsabilidad laboral de Don comienzan a interferir en su vida personal. Mientras, a Peggy le ofrecen una nueva oportunidad de trabajo.

description.en: Episode 0 of season 1
description.es: Episodio 0 de la temporada 1

description.en: It’s Valentine’s Day, and the Sterling Cooper advertising agency is hustling to stay on top of its game and buzzing over the newest office equipment. Don and Duck find themselves at odds over an account. Betty reconnects with an old friend and once again finds herself struggling with car trouble.
description.es: Mientras Sterling Cooper lucha por mantenerse en la cima del juego, corre el rumor de que va ingresar nuevo talento creativo en la agencia.

description.en: Paul hosts a party at his apartment and introduces someone special to his Sterling Cooper colleagues. Peggy visits her family for dinner. Despite a conflict of interest, the Sterling Cooper agency aggressively pursues an airline account and Duck attempts to appeal to the client using an unorthodox approach.
description.es: Durante una fiesta en su casa, Paul les presenta a sus colegas alguien especial. Pese al conflicto de interés.

description.en: Trouble arises on the set of a commercial; Harry tries to gather support for a controversial sponsorship; Betty and Don try to appease a client with a friendly dinner.
description.es: Los problemas llegan al set de un comercial justo cuando Don se escapa de la oficina. Intentará compensar al cliente con una amigable cena.

description.en: Peggy's family hosts a lunch for their church's new priest; Don and Betty enjoy a weekend together; Pete and Ken take a client out to lunch; the staff works to prepare for a last minute pitch meeting.
description.es: La familia de Peggy ofrece una comida para el nuevo sacerdote de su iglesia. Mientras Don y Betty disfrutan de un fin de semana familiar.

description.en: Don has to deal with issues between a TV comedian and his wife; Joan finds Don the perfect secretary.
description.es: Una vez más Don tiene la necesidad de tratar los conflictos con Jimmy, un comediante de televisión, y su esposa.

description.en: Don and Duck try to make peace; Peggy tries to get into the executive's after-hours meetings; Duck deals with a family visit.
description.es: Don y Duck intentan hacer las paces. A su vez, Peggy trata de participar en las reuniones de ejecutivos que se hacen fuera de la oficina.

description.en: Don buys a new car; Pete, Harry and Ken strategize to attract new business; Don's secretary makes a grave error; Cooper has a new piece of art in his office.
description.es: Don compra un carro nuevo, acorde a su imagen de ejecutivo. La secretaria de Don comente un error que significaría un problema para Joan.

description.en: Peggy contributes on a church project; Duck and Don try to create market appeal for a foreign beer brand; Harry recruits assistance to help with the workload in his department.
description.es: El padre Gill convence a Peggy de contribuir en un proyecto pro-bono de la iglesia. Mientras Don y Duck intentan cerrar un negocio.

description.en: Freddy Rumsen disappoints his team during a pitch. Pete finds an opportunity at the office to exploit while Don proves his loyalty to an old friend. Betty finds a welcome distraction in Sara Beth.
description.es: Freddy Rumsen decepciona a su equipo durante la presentación de una idea. Mientras Pete tiene la oportunidad de descargarse en la oficina.

description.en: Betty visits her father; Paul's girlfriend tries to convince him to prioritize his duties; Pete's mother disapproves of his and Trudy's idea.
description.es: Betty visita a su padre enfermo. Mientras Sheila, la novia de Paul, intenta convencerlo de priorizar sus deberes cívicos antes del viaje.

description.en: Don makes some new friends on his trip to Los Angeles; Peggy looks for romance; Duck ponders the future of Sterling Cooper.
description.es: En un viaje de negocios a Los Angeles, Don conoce unos nuevos y excitantes amigos. Peggy está buscando un romance en el trabajo.

description.en: Don meets up with an old friend; Pete's personal life presents problems; Joan brings her boyfriend to the office.
description.es: Durante su estadía en el Sur de California, Don visita a una amiga del pasado. Mientras una importante cuenta está en juego.

description.en: The office scrambles without Don; Betty learns some disconcerting news.
description.es: Finalmente Pete perdió la cuenta y no sabe como informarlo. Rumores sobre la inminente fusión se cuela entre los empleados.

description.en: In the third-season opener, Salvatore and Don take a business trip out of town. Pete Campbell and Ken Cosgrove worry about the changes at Sterling-Cooper and how the changes will impact them.
description.es: Cuando Don y Salvatore van a Baltimore por cuestiones de negocios, Don, por casualidad, descubre un sorprendente secreto de su compañero.

description.en: Don's father-in-law pays a visit to his daughter's family. Peggy works hard on a campaign while the firm tries to decide if they will accommodate an unusual request from a client. Elsewhere, Roger plans a wedding.
description.es: Peggy trabaja duro en una campaña. En casa, Betty discute con su hermano, quien insiste en llevar a su padre a un ancianato.

description.en: The writers make an attempt to stave off late-night boredom during a mandatory overtime session. Roger throws a party as Joan and Greg host their own party. Sally has a run-in with Grandpa.
description.es: Cuando Peggy, Paul y Smitty tienen que trabajar todo el fin de semana en la nueva campaña de Bacardi, tratan de inspirarse de modo inusual.

description.en: Don and his father-in-law cross paths. Meanwhile, Peggy is in search of a new roommate; and a rich new client is excited to be doing business with the firm.
description.es: Horace, un extravagante amigo del colegio de Pete, entra a trabajar a Sterling Cooper. Mientras, Peggy coloca un anuncio.

description.en: Sally's behavior causes concern for Don and Betty. Betty has an eye-opening dream that has a strange effect on her. Pete tries to work a new business angle in his dealings.
description.es: Don y Betty visitan la escuela de Sally para discutir el mal comportamiento de su hija. Pete se entera que su cliente es popular.

title.en: Guy Walks Into an Advertising Agency
title.es: Meter la pata en una agencia

description.en: Sterling Cooper receives a surprise visitor; Sally has been spooked by something (or someone); and Joan receives some shocking news.
description.es: Sterling Cooper recibe la sorpresiva visita de dos ejecutivos londinenses. Mientras Sally se altera por algo que la mantiene despierta.

description.en: Betty tries her hand at local politics. Don is forced into thinking about the future. Peggy receives a luxurious gift.
description.es: Betty trata de impedir la instalación de un tanque de agua que podría arruinar el paisaje. Mientras Peggy recibe un costoso regalo.

description.en: Don decides to include Betty on a company business trip. Pete lends a hand to a neighbor in his apartment building.
description.es: La campaña de Betty para suspender el proyecto de la reserva ecológica es un éxito. Entretanto, Don la invita para un viaje de negocios.

description.en: There is trouble for Don and Sal in giving their clients what they ask for. Meanwhile, Betty hosts a fundraiser.
description.es: Connie le ofrece a Don una oportunidad para ganar la cuenta del Hilton. Sin embargo, Don no da con el enfoque correcto para la campaña.

description.en: The firm celebrates as they hit a milestone. Peggy and Paul compete to secure the same account.
description.es: Sterling Cooper celebra su cuadragésimo aniversario y Don es asignado para dar el discurso final. Mientras, Peggy y Paul tendrán una pelea.

description.en: A former client makes a return; Betty and her kids go on a trip; and Joan and Greg make plans for their future.
description.es: Betty y los niños dejan la ciudad por un par de semanas. Cuando Joan prepara a Greg para una entrevista, Greg revela un secreto familiar.

description.en: Peggy's taste in men proves questionable. Pete has to make a big decision about his career and a candidate makes a big impression on Don.
description.es: Cuando Pete pierde la promoción para Cosgrove, toma algunas decisiones que podrían afectar su carrera. La muerte de Kennedy traerá cambios.

title.en: Shut the Door. Have a Seat

description.en: Don has a big meeting with Connie about their future relationship. Betty is the beneficiary of some interesting advice and Pete has a serious sit-down with some clients.
description.es: Draper descubre que la agencia ha sido vendida a McCann, convence a Sterling y Cooper de que los despidan para comprar de nuevo la firma.

description.en: Don deals with a trade-paper interview but doesn't want to talk about himself. A manufacturer of a "wholesome" two-piece bathing suit wants to hire the firm but doesn't want anything too risque. Pete and Peggy try to secure more money for the firm.
description.es: La nueva firma está luchando por el negocio, por lo que Peter y Peggy usan un truco barato de publicidad como último recurso.

title.en: Christmas Comes But Once a Year
title.es: Navidad solo es una vez al año

description.en: The agency's Christmas party is nearly spoiled by the late arrival of a surprise and not-so-welcome visitor.
description.es: Freddy regresa con un valioso cliente, la firma ofrece de mala gana una fiesta de navidad para su cliente más importante.

description.en: Don takes a trip. Joan has scheduling problems. Don and Lane get to know each other a little better.
description.es: Don viaja a Los Angeles a visitar a Anna antes de irse de vacaciones a Acapulco, pero malas noticias hacen que cancele su viaje y regrese.

description.en: An edict from Roger and Lane puts Pete in a personal dilemma.
description.es: Peter descubre que va a ser padre, y debe confesarle unas malas noticias a su suegro. Una campaña tendrá consecuencias personales en Don.

description.en: Don and Pete disregard Roger's plans in order to land a new client.
description.es: Don es forzado a competir con un engreído rival por una potencial cuenta en Honda, pero el prejuicio de Roger causa problemas inesperados.

description.en: Peggy clashes with her new creative partner; Don pitches under unusual circumstances.
description.es: Don tiene un fin de semana desenfrenado luego de ganar el premio CLIO. Peter está furioso luego de descubrir que contrataron a Ken Cosgrove.

description.en: A deadline disrupts Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce.
description.es: Don evita deliberadamente una llamada importante de California, porque sabe que son malas noticias sobre Anna.

description.en: Joan and Peggy deal with high-jinx in the office.
description.es: Don se torna más cerrado al lidiar con la muerte de Anna. Betty le prohíbe a Don ir a la fiesta de cumpleaños de Eugene.

description.en: Peggy is forced to face some unpleasant facts about a client's discriminatory business practices. Don and Faye's burgeoning relationship is tested when Sally runs away from home and turns up at the office. Roger tries to rekindle his affair with Joan.
description.es: Peggy es forzada a enfrentar hechos desagradables y discriminatorios en los negocios de un cliente. Don y Faye serán puestos a prueba.

description.en: An unannounced visitor at the Francis home rattles Betty.
description.es: Don teme que su mentira se descubra cuando agentes del gobierno le hacen preguntas a Betty; Lane tiene sorprendentes noticias para su padre.

description.en: Sterling Cooper Draper Price employees resort to scuttlebutt after an agency wide meeting is called.
description.es: Todos los empleados de Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce tratan de estar calmados luego de que descubren que Roger perdió su cuenta más grande.

description.en: In the midst of a crisis, Don runs into an old friend.
description.es: Don toma una decisión desesperada para salvar la agencia, pero los otros socios están furiosos con sus acciones.

description.en: Don and Peggy are faced with life-altering decisions.
description.es: Don lleva a sus hijos a California y regresa con un anuncio sorpresa. Mientras, Betty despide la niñera de los niños antes de mudarse.

description.en: For the Draper family, life has changed. The children must adapt to a new home, a new brother, and a new stepmother. Don seems to have everything a man could want. However, Megan, still employed at the agency, has difficulty interpreting Don's expectations for a sex kitten at home and a prim and proper employee at the office.
description.es: El cuadragésimo cumpleaños de Don sea acerca, por lo que Megan planea una fiesta sorpresa ignorando las advertencias de Peggy.

description.en: Don and Megan work out some of their issues, Roger and Pete butt heads, and Joan has a run-in with a house guest.
description.es: Joan está dudando sobre su trabajo en Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce. Mientras tanto, Don aún está molesto con Megan, Pete sigue discutiendo con Roger.

description.en: As Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce tries to build upon its current business, Peggy is given new responsibility. Don and Harry indulge a client. Betty contemplates her mortality after seeing a doctor.
description.es: Mientras que Sterling Cooper Draper Pryce trata de construir sobre su negocio actual, a Peggy le entregan una nueva responsabilidad. Por otra parte, Don y Harry logran satisfacer a un cliente.

description.en: Don has an encounter with someone from the past. Meanwhile, Roger increases Peggy's workload, and Joan comes to a momentous decision.
description.es: Un engripado Don se topa con alguien de su pasado. Roger le paga a Peggy para trabajar hasta tarde un viernes en la noche.

description.en: Lane attempts to land an account with Jaguar Cars, leading to a altercation with Pete. Pete and Trudy host a dinner party in the suburbs.
description.es: Don, Megan, Ken y Cynthia son invitados a una cena en los suburbios por Trudy y Pete, donde Peter comienza a colapsar bajo la presión de su vida personal y laboral.

description.en: Peggy has a tough time during a particularly formidable pitch. Don calls on a potential client. Roger and Jane have an experience with LSD.
description.es: Un mismo día es visto a través de los ojos de tres personas: Peggy, Roger y Don. Mientras que Peggy arruina la presentación Heinz.

description.en: Don is honored at a banquet for the American Cancer Society, but finds his professional reputation has been damaged. Sally lends a hand to a relative. Megan's parents come to visit from Canada.
description.es: Los Draper son visitados por los padres de Megan, mientras que Don trata de salvar la cuenta Heinz y se prepara para recibir un premio.

description.en: Megan has second thoughts about her future at Sterling, Cooper, Draper, Pryce. Peggy lashes out when she's inadvertently put in the uncomfortable position of having to lie. Pete's effort to protect an acquaintance doesn't turn out quite like he expected.
description.es: La tensión entre Peggy y Megan crece cuando Peggy se ve obligada a guardar un secreto que podría perjudicar la relación de Don.

description.en: Don attempts to regain his creative spark, but undermines a member of his staff while doing so. Roger pursues some new clients, and in the process, hurts Jane. Betty displays her pettiness when she reveals a distressing secret to Sally.
description.es: Como producto de su envidia, Betty interfiere en la feliz relación de Don y Megan contándole a Sally sobre la primera esposa de Don, Anna.

description.en: Harry finds himself in an uncomfortable position after reconnecting with Paul Kinsey who has joined the Hare Krishnas. Lane takes drastic and unethical measures to get out of financial trouble. Don spends an afternoon with Joan to get her mind off her marital problems.
description.es: Lane se encuentra en apuros cuando necesita conseguir 8.000 dólares en dos días para pagar impuestos a Inglaterra.

description.en: Pete asks Joan to make a personal and moral sacrifice to ensure the company lands the Jaguar account. Don becomes furious after learning of the impact Megan's new profession will have on their life. Feeling unappreciated, Peggy attends lunch with Freddy Rumsen, who encourages her to make a move.
description.es: Joan recibe una oferta lucrativa y se vuelve indispensable para la cuenta con Jaguar, y más tarde para SCDP.

description.en: Lane's shameful secret comes to the surface with dire consequences. Don recaptures his hunger for success, and Sally experiences a major milestone.
description.es: Bert Cooper consigue el cheque falsificado por Lane Pryce, y Don toma una decisión radical que llevará a Lane a escoger un camino drástico.

description.en: Roger seeks to expand his affair with Megan's mother. Pete has a "last" encounter with Beth with lasting repercussions. Megan struggles to find acting work and asks for Don's help getting an audition. Peggy still seeks Don's approval.
description.es: La firma planea expandir sus espacios. Don empieza a ver fantasmas de su pasado y Megan le pide un favor que podría impulsar su carrera.

description.en: Don and Megan take a trip to Hawaii for the holidays, Sally's friend visits the Francis family, a comedian torpedoes Peggy's Super Bowl ad campaign, and Roger gets some bad news about his mother.
description.es: Don y Megan huyendo del frío de Nueva York y de vacaciones en Hawai, donde es reconocida por su papel en la televisión. En la nueva agencia, Peggy necesita una nueva idea para un comercial que saldrá al aire en el medio tiempo del Super Bowl. Roger recibe una noticia triste.

description.en: Don strikes up a friendship with the surgeon in his building, Peggy tries to save her campaign, Roger makes a scene at his mother's funeral, and Betty goes to Manhattan to find Sally's friend.
description.es: Luego de vacacionar en Hawái, la carrera de Megan en televisión afecta el ego de Don. Roger enfrenta una pérdida familiar a su manera. Por otra parte, Peggy lidia con un cliente exigente por una controversia en un comercial para el Super Bowl.

description.en: While Don continues his affair with Sylvia, Pete's latest infidelity threatens his marriage. Meanwhile, Peggy's icy relationship with her new staff continues, but she also gets an unlikely tip on a potential new client.
description.es: Megan le confía un secreto impactante a Sylvia, su vecina. El romance de una noche de Peter termina sorprendentemente mal. Por otro lado, Peggy deberá trabajar en una campaña para Heinz que fue rechazada por la agencia de Don.

description.en: Don works in secret on a Heinz ketchup campaign while Megan gets a love scene on the set of her soap opera. Meanwhile, Harry makes his power play while Joan has more trouble with the secretaries.
description.es: Don asiste a una incómoda cena con Megan y sus compañeros de trabajo. Joan y Harry Crane tienen una fuerte discusión en la agencia. Por otro lado, Don y Peggy se reencuentran mientras ambos compiten por la campaña de Heinz.

description.en: Set among the events surrounding Martin Luther King's assassination, Peggy tries to get a new apartment, Ginsberg is set up on a date, and Don has a revelation during his weekend with the kids.
description.es: Don, Peggy y otros publicistas reconocidos asisten a la ceremonia de los Premios ANDY, la cual es drásticamente interrumpida cuando se anuncia la muerte de Martin Luther King. Por otro lado, Peggy oferta por un apartamento nuevo en Upper East Side.

description.en: As the firm prepares to go public, Don and Pete's actions cause them to lose two huge clients. However, Roger uses a new connection to put them in position to gain their biggest client ever.
description.es: Don decide renunciar a la cuenta de Jaguar y recibe inesperadas reacciones de Pete y Joan. Roger trae buenas noticias a la agencia. Por otro lado, Pete se topa con su suegro en un lugar vergonzoso, lo que le costará más de lo que se imagina.

description.en: Things quickly become awkward after the two firms merge, Don asserts his dominance over Sylvia, Pete has to deal with his ailing mother, and Bob Benson helps out a sick Joan.
description.es: Pete recibe una visita poco agradable. Ted se instala en su nueva oficina. Mientras, Peggy no parece estar muy cómoda regresando a SCDP. Se enciende el amorío de Don y Joan asiste inesperadamente al hospital.

description.en: The creative department has a wild, drug-influenced weekend as they work on the Chevy account, Don has trouble letting go of Sylvia, and Sally walks in on an unwelcome intruder.
description.es: Don trata de superar el rompimiento con su amante. El equipo busca inspiración para la campaña Chevy utilizando un método poco ortodoxo sugerido por Jim, lo que traerá consecuencias y desagradables recuerdos a Don.

description.en: Peggy becomes unsatisfied with her apartment and with Abe, Don has an eventful weekend with Betty while Megan has problems on the set, Roger has time with his grandson, and Pete begins exploring his options outside the firm.
description.es: Don se topa con Betty camino al campamento de Bobby y ambos comparten una reveladora velada. Joan hace planes fuera de la oficina con Bob. Mientras tanto, los planes de Abe y Peggy de mudarse son interrumpidos por un irónico incidente.

description.en: Cutler and Chaough prepare to make radical changes to the firm while Sterling and Draper are visiting a client in Los Angeles. Joan's decision to go after a new account on her own leaves Pete furious and frustrated.
description.es: Los socios discuten potenciales nombres para la nueva agencia. Mientras tanto, Don y Roger viajan a Los Ángeles por negocios y algo más. Además, con la ayuda de Peggy, Joan intenta firmar un gran cliente por su cuenta: Avon Cosmetics.

description.en: Don is preoccupied with keeping Sylvia's son from being drafted, Peggy has a rat in her apartment, Don and Ted bury the hatchet, Pete has a problem with his mother's new nurse, and Sally makes an accidental discovery about her father.
description.es: Lo que comienza como un favor para el hijo de Arnold termina poniendo el matrimonio de Don en peligro. Pete cuestiona las intenciones de Manolo, el enfermero de su madre. Mientras tanto, Peggy trata de adaptarse a su nueva vida de soltera.

description.en: Don renews his battle with Ted after seeing his relationship with Peggy, Sally interviews at a boarding school, and Pete discovers Bob Benson's background.
description.es: La "amistad" cercana de Ted y Peggy empieza a irritar a Don. Luego de ser obligados a trabajar juntos, Pete confronta a Bob Benson sobre su verdadera identidad. Por otro lado, Betty lleva a Sally a una entrevista en un prestigioso internado.

description.en: With his personal and professional life crumbling around him, Don positions himself for a change of scenery. Meanwhile, Pete's life is falling apart as well, thanks to the meddling of Bob Benson.
description.es: En el último episodio, Pete recibe trágicas noticias. Ted concluye en algo inesperado sobre su relación con Peggy. Ted, Stan y Don compiten por la misma cuenta en California. Los socios confrontan a Don sobre su "cuestionable conducta".

description.en: Don makes a new friend. Joan meets a client for drinks. Peggy hears impressive new work. Roger has a puzzling phone call.
description.es: Don tiene un nuevo amigo. Joan conoce a un cliente. Peggy escucha sobre un impresionante nuevo trabajo. Roger tiene una misteriosa llamada.

description.en: Peggy receives a bouquet of flowers at the office. Pete navigates the politics of new business. Joan is put in an impossibly awkward situation.
description.es: Peggy recibe un ramo de flores en la oficina. Pete conoce las políticas de un nuevo negocio. Joan es puesta en una situación incómoda.

description.en: Don takes an impromptu trip. Betty has lunch with a friend. Harry lobbies for a cause. The partners consider a questionable asset.
description.es: Don improvisa un viaje. Betty almuerza con un amigo. Harry presiona por una causa. Los socios consideran un activo cuestionable.

description.en: Sterling Cooper & Partners prepares for a guest; Don contacts an old friend; Roger deals with problems at home; Peggy is underestimated.
description.es: Mona y Roger buscan a Margaret luego de enterarse de que ha huido de su familia para vivir en una comuna hippie. Lou obliga a Peggy y a Don a trabajar juntos en una campaña para Burger Chef. Por otra parte, Don recibe un valioso consejo de Freddy.

description.en: Don has a visitor from his past. Stan embarrasses a superior. Peggy helps Ginsberg with a problem. Harry finds that he has a new ally at the agency.
description.es: Don tiene un visitante de su pasado. Stan humilla a un superior. Peggy ayuda a Ginsberg con un problema. Harry tiene un nuevo aliado en la agencia.

description.en: Peggy determinedly collects research for a pitch. Pete is invited to join an exclusive club. Joan looks forward to spending time with her friend.
description.es: Peggy recoge la investigación para un estudio. Pete es invitado a unirse a un club exclusivo. Joan espera pasar más tiempo con su amiga.

description.en: Don receives a troubling letter. A risky venture entails a new future for Peggy. Roger gets an unexpected phone call. Pete butts heads with Cutler.
description.es: Don recibe una carta preocupante. Una aventura arriesgada brinda a Peggy un nuevo futuro. Roger recibe una llamada inesperada. Pete se topa con Cutler.

description.en: Don attempts to track down a friend, Joan tries to solve a problem with an account and an unlikely person sets up Peggy.
description.es: Don intenta encontrar a un amigo, mientras que Joan tiene problemas con una cuenta. Peggy se encuentra en una situación difícil.

description.en: Roger gives Don some unwanted advice. Peggy and Stan disagree over an account's personnel. Harry asks for Don's blessing.
description.es: Roger le da a Don algunos consejos no deseados; Peggy y Stan están en desacuerdo sobre un asunto laboral; Harry le pide a Don su bendición.

description.en: Roger pawns off a project on Don, Joan goes on a business trip and Peggy and Pete cannot agree on how to deal with an account.
description.es: Roger se libera de un proyecto a expensas de Don y Joan hace un viaje de negocios. Una vez más, Peggy y Pete no se ponen de acuerdo.

description.en: Don comes up with a big idea, Roger asks Joan to help him fix a clerical error and Peggy has difficulties casting for a commercial.
description.es: Don tiene una gran idea. Roger quiere que Joan lo ayude a lidiar con un error en la oficina.

description.en: Don receives a reward for his work. Joan butts heads with her co-worker on an account. Faced with a big decision, Roger dodges.
description.es: Don recibe una recompensa por su trabajo. Joan discute con un compañero de trabajo por una cuenta. Roger evita tomar una importante decisión.

description.en: Don has trouble sleeping. Pete is blindsided by a difficult friend. Facing a new challenge, Henry arranges a family reunion.
description.es: Don tiene problemas para conciliar el sueño. Pete es sorprendido por un amigo. Henry organiza una reunión familiar.

description.en: The stories of Don Draper, his family and his co-workers at Sterling Cooper & Partners conclude.
description.es: La historia de Don Draper, su familia y compañeros llega a su fin en este capítulo.
